scn ZkbRCUtlTrap01BSCRIPT
; Part B of RC Utility Tunnel Bug Trap, box activator - closes trap doors & stops activator going off again
begin onTrigger player
ZkbRCUtlTrap01Door1.SetOpenState 0 ZkbRCUtlTrap01Door2.SetOpenState 0 ZkbRCUtlTrap01Door3.SetOpenState 0 ZkbRCUtlTrap01Door4.SetOpenState 0
If ZkbRCUtlTrap01Door1.GetOpenState == 3 && ZkbRCUtlTrap01Door2.GetOpenState == 3 && ZkbRCUtlTrap01Door3.GetOpenState == 3 && ZkbRCUtlTrap01Door4.GetOpenState == 3 ZkbRCUtlTrap01BActREF.Disable endif
end

scn ZkbRCUtlTrap01ASCRIPT
; Activator script for the laser tripwire emitter. ; JSH 03/21/11 ; Zkb modified for Bug Trap in RC Utility Tunnel - opens trap door
ref rBeam ; This is the laser beam reference. This emitter should be linked to the associated beam
Short bSkillPassed ; If the player has passed the skill check, look for button press when in the game mode block. Short nButton ; button var for menus
BEGIN OnActivate
If ( IsActionRef Player == 1 )
Set rBeam to GetLinkedRef;
If ( rBeam.GetDisabled == 1 ) ShowMessage NVDLC04LaserTripwireEmitterHarmlessMSG; SetDestroyed 1; Else ShowMessage NVDLC04LaserTripwireEmitterMSG; Set bSkillPassed to 1; Endif
EndIf
;Zkb Bit
if ZkbRCUtlTrap01BXmk.GetDisabled == 1 ZkbRCUtlTrap01BXmk.Enable endif ZkbRCUtlTrap01Door1.SetOpenState 1 ZkbRCUtlTrap01Door2.SetOpenState 1 ZkbRCUtlTrap01Door3.SetOpenState 1 ZkbRCUtlTrap01Door4.SetOpenState 1
END
BEGIN GameMode
If ( bSkillPassed == 1 ) ;don't run stuff in game mode unless recently activated
Set nButton to GetButtonPressed ;grab the button state, you don't know when this will be set
If ( nButton > -1 ) ;if a valid response is received start doing stuff
If ( nButton == 1 ) ShowMessage TrapLaserDisabled; rBeam.Disable; rBeam.MarkForDelete; RewardXP 90; Set bSkillPassed to 0; ;stop running stuff SetDestroyed 1; Else Set bSkillPassed to 0 ; EndIf
EndIf
EndIf
END

scn ZkbTrapTripwire02SCRIPT

ref actionRef ref TrapWeaponRef

set actionRef to getActionRef set TrapWeaponRef to GetLinkedRef
if actionRef.hasPerk LightStep == 0 activate playsound3D TRPTripwireLaser PlaySound ZkbWPNFlamerFire3DLPM TrapWeaponRef.FireWeapon WeapFlamer endif
end

scn ZkbSporeCarrierSCRIPT
; activate spore carrier - initially disabled so they can't be shot from a distance
ref SporeCarrier
Begin OnTriggerEnter Player
Set SporeCarrier to GetLinkedRef If SporeCarrier.GetDead == 0 SporeCarrier.Enable Endif
End
Begin OnTriggerLeave Player
Set SporeCarrier to GetLinkedRef If SporeCarrier.GetDead == 1 Disable MarkForDelete ; gets rid of activator elseif SporeCarrier.IsInCombat == 0 SporeCarrier.Disable Endif
End

scn ZkbBurgessBlackBoardSCRIPT
; script to control button press on message ; when reading burgess's black board notes
Int ButtonVar
Begin OnTriggerEnter Player
ShowMessage ZkbBurgessBBMsg
End
Begin GameMode
set buttonVar to getbuttonpressed if ButtonVar == -1 ; No button pressed Return elseif ButtonVar == 0 ; Make a note Player.Additem ZkbBurgessBBNotes01 1 ZkbBurgessBBNoteActREF.Disable ; Remove activator ZkbBurgessBBNoteActREF.MarkForDelete elseif ButtonVar == 1 ; ignore it ZkbBurgessBBNoteActREF.Disable ; Remove activator ZkbBurgessBBNoteActREF.MarkForDelete endif RemoveMe
End

scn ZkbRCUtlTrapSwitch01SCRIPT
; Part A of RC Utility Tunnel Bug Trap ; Activates doors, activate parent does not want to work with a script on the door
short DoOnce
Begin OnActivate
Activate if ZkbRCUtlTrap01Door1.GetOpenState == 3 || ZkbRCUtlTrap01Door1.GetOpenState == 4 ; closed or closing ZkbRCUtlTrap01Door1.SetOpenState 1 ZkbRCUtlTrap01Door2.SetOpenState 1 ZkbRCUtlTrap01Door3.SetOpenState 1 ZkbRCUtlTrap01Door4.SetOpenState 1 else ZkbRCUtlTrap01Door1.SetOpenState 0 ZkbRCUtlTrap01Door2.SetOpenState 0 ZkbRCUtlTrap01Door3.SetOpenState 0 ZkbRCUtlTrap01Door4.SetOpenState 0 Endif
if DoOnce == 0 && ZkbRCUtlTrap01BXmk.GetDisabled == 1 ZkbRCUtlTrap01BXmk.Enable set DoOnce to 1 endif
END

scn ZkbWaterFieldQuest01Script
short KilledSporePlants short KilledSporeCarriers short complete short ZeroSet
Begin GameMode
If (ZeroSet != 1) Set KilledSporePlants to 0 Set KilledSporeCarriers to 0 Set complete to 0 Set ZeroSet to 1 Endif
; checks to see if all nasty plants are dead
If GetStage ZkbWaterFieldQuest == 20 if KilledSporePlants + KilledSporeCarriers == 2 SetStage ZkbWaterFieldQuest 80 endif endif
End

Scn ZkbRCCaughtThiefSCRIPT
; Knocks out player and sends them to jail, do not collect Ј200
Short Interval Float Timer
Begin OnTrigger Player
Set ZkbPokeQuest01.Thief to 1 ZkbRCJailActREF.Enable ; activator for ZkbRCBlinderTalkThiefSCRIPT ZkbRCJailDoorREF.SetOpenState 0 ; shuts & locks jail cell ZkbRCJailDoorREF.Lock 255 ZkbJailFood01.Enable ; Enables items in cell ZkbJailDrink01.Enable ZkbRCPrisonCellBedREF.SetOwnership Set Timer to Timer + GetSecondsPassed If Interval == 0 PlaySound NPCMrHouseElectro ZkbKnockOutEffectREF.Enable Set Interval to 1 Elseif Interval == 1 && Timer < 1 Player.DamageAV fatigue 10000 Set Interval to 2 Return Elseif Interval == 2 && Timer >= 1 DisablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 0 1 1 ZkbKnockOutEffectREF.Disable ZkbRCHotelUtlDoor02REF.SetOpenState 0 Set Interval to 3 Return Elseif Interval == 3 && Timer >= 3 ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackISFX Set Interval to 4 Return Elseif Interval == 4 && Timer >= 5 Player.RestoreAV fatigue 10000 Set Interval to 5 Return Elseif Interval == 5 && Timer >= 5 PlaySound NPCHumanRestrainedUp Player.MoveTo ZkbRCPrisonCellMkREF Set Interval to 6 Endif
End

scn ZkbAmbushCamp01SCRIPT
; Trigger for encounter at Travellers Camp
Short DoOnce Short CampTrigger ; so ambush is only activated while in camp Short FirstUse ; ensures activation on first use Short Chance ; Variable for chance of encounter
Begin GameMode If (DoOnce != 1) Set CampTrigger to 0 Set FirstUse to 1 Set DoOnce to 1 Endif End
; enables trigger while at camp
Begin OnTriggerEnter Player
Set CampTrigger to 1 ; ZkbRCHotelExitSCRIPT so Ritas cafe Hotel will reset if you fast travel If ZkbPokeQuest01.CageB == 1 ZkbRCHotelBedB1REF.SetOwnership ZkbZOwnerFaction ZkbRCHotelBedB2REF.SetOwnership ZkbZOwnerFaction ZkbRCHotelCageBREF.lock 255 Set ZkbPokeQuest01.CageB to 0 endif
If ZkbPokeQuest01.CageE == 1 ZkbRCHotelBedE1REF.SetOwnership ZkbZOwnerFaction ZkbRCHotelCageEREF.lock 255 Set ZkbPokeQuest01.CageE to 0 endif
If ZkbPokeQuest01.CageH == 1 ZkbRCHotelBedH1REF.SetOwnership ZkbZOwnerFaction ZkbRCHotelBedH2REF.SetOwnership ZkbZOwnerFaction ZkbRCHotelBedH3REF.SetOwnership ZkbZOwnerFaction Set ZkbPokeQuest01.CageH to 0 endif
End
; disables trigger when not at camp
Begin OnTriggerLeave Player Set CampTrigger to 0 ZkbTravCampAct01.Disable End
; 1 in 4 chace of activating
Begin MenuMode 1012 ; sleep
Set Chance to 1 + GetRandomPercent * 4 / 100 ; creates number 1-4 If CampTrigger == 1 && FirstUse == 0 && Chance == 4 If GetPCSleepHours > 0 ZkbTravCampAct01.Enable endif else CampTrigger == 1 && FirstUse == 1 If GetPCSleepHours > 0 ZkbTravCampAct01.Enable Set FirstUse to 0 endif EndIf
End

scn ZkbRandomEncounter02SCRIPT
; Random encounter, active once Vault 616 & Trail Quest Completed ; 50% chance of encounter
Short Chance ; Variable for chance of encounter ref XMark1

If ZkbEncounterQuest.Encounter2 == 0 && ZkbEncounterQuest.V616Quest == 1 && ZkbEncounterQuest.TrailQuest == 1 Set ZkbEncounterQuest.Encounter2 to 1 Set ZkbEncounterQuest.Date2 to GameDaysPassed + 1 Set Chance to 1 + GetRandomPercent * 2 / 100 If Chance == 2 ; ShowMessage ZkbTestMsg1 Set XMark1 to GetLinkedRef XMark1.Enable Endif Endif
End

scn ZkbTrailEncountersQuestsSCRIPT
short V616Quest short TrailQuest short GHQuest short Encounter1 short Encounter2 short Encounter3 short Encounter4 Short Date1 Short Date2 Short Date3 Short Date4
; script resets Encounter variable back to 0 after 1 day
Begin Gamemode
If GameDaysPassed > Date1 Set Encounter1 to 0 Endif
If GameDaysPassed > Date2 Set Encounter2 to 0 Endif
If GameDaysPassed > Date3 Set Encounter3 to 0 Endif
If GameDaysPassed > Date4 Set Encounter4 to 0 Endif
End

End

scn ZkbBlinderQuest01Script
; Blinder Quest script
short MetBlinder short ZeroSet short CageB short CageE short CageH Short Thief Short QuestADate ; Lillypad field quest Short PondlurkAct Short V616Note Short Job03BRay2 ; ZkbGHouseQuest01 - Job03BRay variable copy (I forgot it was still used after the quest finished!)
Begin GameMode
If ZeroSet != 1 Set MetBlinder to 0 Set CageB to 0 Set CageE to 0 Set CageH to 0 Set Thief to 0 ; variable to control which packages run during jail sequence Set QuestADate to 0 Set PondlurkAct to 0 Set V616Note to 0 ; variable so player gets only one go at guessing vault history Set ZeroSet to 1 Endif
; Script to enable pondlurks 5 days after Spore carriers/plants have been killed
if GetQuestCompleted ZkbWaterFieldQuest == 1 && QuestADate == 0 Set QuestADate to GameDaysPassed Set PondlurkAct to 1 endif
if GameDaysPassed >= QuestADate+5 && PondlurkAct == 1 ZkbPondlurkAct01REF.Enable ZkbPondlurkAct02REF.Enable ZkbPondlurkAct03REF.Enable ZkbPondlurkAct04REF.Enable ZkbPondlurkAct05REF.Enable ZkbPondlurkAct06REF.Enable ZkbPondlurkAct07REF.Enable ZkbPondlurkAct08REF.Enable ZkbPondlurkAct09REF.Enable ZkbPondlurkAct10REF.Enable ZkbPondlurkAct11REF.Enable ZkbPondlurkAct12REF.Enable ZkbPondlurkAct13REF.Enable ZkbPondlurkAct14REF.Enable ZkbPondlurkAct15REF.Enable Set PondlurkAct to 2
endif
End

ScriptName ZkbAutoDoorLockSCRIPT
Float Timer
Begin OnLoad ; if the player left the door open the last time he was in here, close it. If GetOpenState == 1 SetOpenState 0 If GetLockLevel > 0 Lock EndIf EndIf End
Begin OnActivate
Set Timer to 10 Activate
End
Begin GameMode
If Timer > 0 Set Timer to Timer - GetSecondsPassed ElseIf GetOpenState == 1 SetOpenState 0 Set Timer to 0 If GetLockLevel > 0 Lock EndIf EndIf
If GetOpenState == 3 Set Timer to 0 EndIf End

scn ZkbCisterGateSCRIPT
; Vault 616 Maintenance drown robots script for Cister valve act ;Short DoOnce
Begin OnActivate
; sets cistern sluice gate & indicator light
if ZkbV05CisternGate.GetOpenState == 1 ; open ZkbV05CisternGate.SetOpenState 0 ; close the sluice gate ZkbV05CisternGate.Lock 255 ZkbV05CisternLightOn.Disable elseif ZkbV05CisternGate.GetOpenState == 3 ; closed ZkbV05CisternGate.SetOpenState 1 ; open the sluice gate ZkbV05CisternLightOn.Enable endif
; fills cistern when gates are correctly set
if ZkbV05OutFlowGate.GetOpenState == 3 && ZkbV05CisternGate.GetOpenState == 2 ; closed/opening=fill cistern ZkbV05CisternDoor01.SetOpenState 0 ; Shut & lock cistern doors ZkbV05CisternDoor01.Lock 255 ZkbV05CisternDoor02.SetOpenState 0 ZkbV05CisternDoor02.Lock 255 ZkbHighWaterXMk01.Enable ; sets high water ; If ZkbHighWaterXMk01.GetDisabled == 0 ; if doOnce == 0 ; ZkbCisternBot01.kill ; ZkbCisternBot02.kill ; ZkbCisternBot03.kill ; ZkbCisternBot04.kill ; set doOnce to 1 ;Trigger is only set off one time ; endif endif
endif
; empties cistern when gates are correctly set
if ZkbV05OutFlowGate.GetOpenState == 1 && ZkbV05CisternGate.GetOpenState == 2; open/opening=empty cistern ZkbV05CisternDoor01.Unlock ; unlock cistern doors ZkbV05CisternDoor02.Unlock ZkbHighWaterXMk01.Disable ; sets low water endif
End

If ZkbPokeQuest01.CageE == 1 ZkbRCHotelBedE1REF.SetOwnership ZkbZOwnerFaction ZkbRCHotelCageEREF.SetOpenState 0 ZkbRCHotelCageEREF.lock 255 Set ZkbPokeQuest01.CageE to 0 endif
If ZkbPokeQuest01.CageH == 1 ZkbRCHotelBedH1REF.SetOwnership ZkbZOwnerFaction ZkbRCHotelBedH2REF.SetOwnership ZkbZOwnerFaction ZkbRCHotelBedH3REF.SetOwnership ZkbZOwnerFaction Set ZkbPokeQuest01.CageH to 0 endif
PCB

scn ZkbRCBlinderTalkThiefSCRIPT
Begin OnTrigger Player
Player.RemoveAllItems ZkbRCJailBoxREF 1 1 ; removes players stuff, ouch! Set GameHour to GameHour + 1 ; adds an hour for a bit of realism ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeInFromBlack4sISFX ; Fade player in EnablePlayerControls ; restores player functionality ZkbPearsonBentREF.MoveTo ZkbJailBlinderMkREF ; Moves Bent to chair so he doesn't get into the cell ZkbPearsonBentREF.EVP ZkbBlinderPokeREF.MoveTo ZkbJailBlinderMkREF ; Readies Poke for conversation ZkbBlinderPokeREF.RemoveItem GlassesNCRRangerCivilian 1 ZkbBlinderPokeREF.EVP ; tidy up. Duplicated in ZkbBlinderTalkQA12 Topic if thief sequence bypassed ZkbCompWarnAct01REF.Disable ; Gets rid of companion warnings, no longer required ZkbCompWarnAct01REF.MarkForDelete ZkbCompWarnAct02REF.Disable ZkbCompWarnAct02REF.MarkForDelete ZkbRCThiefSwitchREF.Disable ; removes trap switch for go to jail activator ZkbRCThiefSwitchREF.MarkForDelete ZkbRCThiefSwitchAltREF.Enable ; replaces above trap switch with normal door switch ZkbRCThiefActREF.Disable ; Removes go to jail activator in utility tunnel ZkbRCThiefActREF.MarkForDelete ZkbRCGHQuestCollisionMk1REF.Enable ; Enables collision planes to stop player sneaking back into utility tunnel ZkbRCGHQuestCollisionMk2REF.Enable ZkbRCJailActREF.Disable ; Removes this activator as it is only needed once ZkbRCJailActREF.MarkForDelete
End

Scn ZkbCave04SwitchSCRIPT
; Frobisher cave enables light & turrets ref light
Begin OnActivate if light == 0 set light to GetLinkedRef endif

End

set buttonVar to getbuttonpressed if ButtonVar == -1 ; No button pressed Return elseif ButtonVar == 0 ; Carry on with quest SetStage ZkbJDCrewQuest01 30 elseif ButtonVar == 1 ; Quit quest SetStage ZkbJDCrewQuest01 90 endif RemoveMe
End

End

scn ZkbOutflowGateSCRIPT
; Vault 616 Maintenance drown robots script for outflow valve act ; short doOnce
Begin OnActivate
; Sets outflow sluicegate, waterfall & indicator light
if ZkbV05OutFlowGate.GetOpenState == 1 ; open ZkbV05OutflowGate.SetOpenState 0 ; close the sluice gate ZkbV05OutflowGate.Lock 255 Zkb05V616WaterfallREF.setscale 0 ZkbOutflowXMk.Disable ; Disables water flow elseif ZkbV05OutflowGate.GetOpenState == 3 ; closed ZkbV05OutflowGate.SetOpenState 1 ; open the sluice gate ZkbOutflowXMk.Enable ; enables water flow Zkb05V616WaterfallREF.setscale 1 endif
; fills cistern when gates are correctly set
if ZkbV05OutFlowGate.GetOpenState == 4 && ZkbV05CisternGate.GetOpenState == 1 ; closing/open=fill cistern ZkbV05CisternDoor01.SetOpenState 0 ; Shut & lock cistern doors ZkbV05CisternDoor01.Lock 255 ZkbV05CisternDoor02.SetOpenState 0 ZkbV05CisternDoor02.Lock 255 ZkbV05CisternWaterLow.Disable ; sets high water ZkbHighWaterXMk01.Enable ZkbV05sluiceGate4.SetOpenState 0 ; Locks intake tunnels so player cant get in and trapped ZkbV05sluiceGate4.Lock 255 ZkbV05sluiceGate3.SetOpenState 0 ; Locks intake tunnels so player cant get in and trapped ZkbV05sluiceGate3.Lock 255 ; If ZkbHighWaterXMk01.GetDisabled == 0 ; if doOnce == 0 ; ZkbCisternBot01.kill ; ZkbCisternBot02.kill ; ZkbCisternBot03.kill ; ZkbCisternBot04.kill ; set doOnce to 1 ;Trigger is only set off one time ; endif endif endif
; empties cistern when gates are correctly set
if ZkbV05OutFlowGate.GetOpenState == 2 && ZkbV05CisternGate.GetOpenState == 1; opening/open=empty cistern ZkbV05CisternDoor01.Unlock ; unlock cistern doors ZkbV05CisternDoor02.Unlock ZkbV05CisternWaterLow.Enable ; sets low water ZkbHighWaterXMk01.Disable ZkbV05sluiceGate4.Unlock ; UnLocks intake tunnels ZkbV05sluiceGate3.UnLock endif
End

scn ZkbDoctorLouiseInceSCRIPT
int ShouldStand ; 0 = Should sit, player not in room ; 1 = Should stand, player in room
;--------------------------COPIED FROM DoctorTemplateSCRIPT--------------------------------------------------------- short DoOnce ;Script blocker float Timer ;Timer used for animation control ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
BEGIN GameMode
;--------------------------COPIED FROM DoctorTemplateSCRIPT--------------------------------------------------------- ;When set to 1, plays medical animations for eight seconds then restarts conversation with the player if ( GetAV Variable01 == 1 ) if ( DoOnce== 0 ) disablePlayerControls resetai set Timer to 8 set DoOnce to 1 PlayIdle LooseDoctorHealPlayer endif
set Timer to ( Timer - GetSecondsPassed )
if ( Timer <= 6 ) && ( DoOnce == 1 ) IMod FadeToBlackISFX set DoOnce to 2 endif
if ( Timer <= 0 ) && ( IsImagespaceActive FadeToBlackISFX == 0 ) setstage VDoctors 10 enablePlayerControls SetAv Variable01 3 resetai Set DoOnce to 0 endif
endif
;When set to 1, plays medical animations for eight seconds then restarts conversation with the player if ( GetAV Variable01 == 2 ) if ( DoOnce== 0 ) disablePlayerControls resetai set Timer to 8 set DoOnce to 1 PlayIdle LooseDoctorHealPlayer endif
set Timer to ( Timer - GetSecondsPassed )
if ( Timer <= 6 ) && ( DoOnce == 1 ) IMod FadeToBlackISFX set DoOnce to 2 endif
if ( Timer <= 0 ) && ( IsImagespaceActive FadeToBlackISFX == 0 ) setstage VDoctors 20 enablePlayerControls SetAv Variable01 3 resetai Set DoOnce to 0 endif
endif ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- END

scn ZkbBrightLightEffectSCRIPT
; This script causes vault dwellers to flee on activation trigger ; Copied from tunneler scripts
Short nConfidenceRating ; This stores the actors previous confidence rating
BEGIN ScriptEffectStart
;Copied script for Zion Trail
; Grab the existing confidence and store it, then set it to zero and send them fleeing If (GetActorValue Confidence > 0 ) && ( GetDead == 0 ) Set nConfidenceRating to (GetActorValue Confidence); SetActorValue Confidence 0; ResetAI; EndIf
END
BEGIN ScriptEffectFinish
; Restore their confidence and then reset their ai If ( GetDead == 0 ) && (GetActorValue Confidence == 0 ) SetActorValue Confidence nConfidenceRating; ResetAI; EndIf
END

ScriptName ZkbAutoDoorSCRIPT
Float Timer
Begin OnLoad ; if the player left the door open the last time he was in here, close it. If GetOpenState == 1 SetOpenState 0 EndIf End
Begin OnActivate
Set Timer to 10 Activate
End
Begin GameMode
If Timer > 0 Set Timer to Timer - GetSecondsPassed ElseIf GetOpenState == 1 SetOpenState 0 Set Timer to 0 EndIf
If GetOpenState == 3 Set Timer to 0 EndIf End

begin onTriggerEnter player ZkbJoeCopeREF.useWeapon weapSniperRifle ZkbSMJuncShootEWMk ZkbSMJuncWindMillREF 1 1 1 1 0 ZkbJoeCopeREF.startcombat player
end

Scn ZkbRCPancakeTrepassSCRIPT
;Trigger for trespass at BP's shop
Begin OnTrigger Player
ZkbBaxterREF.startcombat player
End

scn ZkbCrawfordBentSCRIPT
Begin GameMode
;ZkbBentCrawfordREF.SetFactionRank vFreesideLocalDrunkDialogueFaction 1 ;ZkbBentCrawfordREF.SetFactionRank NVDrunks 1
End

scn ZkbRandomEncounter01SCRIPT
; Random encounter, active from start ; Resets after 1 day ; 33% chance of encounter
Short Chance ; Variable for chance of encounter ref XMark1
Begin OnTriggerEnter Player
If ZkbEncounterQuest.Encounter1 == 0 Set ZkbEncounterQuest.Encounter1 to 1 Set ZkbEncounterQuest.Date1 to GameDaysPassed + 1 Set Chance to 1 + GetRandomPercent * 3 / 100 If Chance == 3 ; ShowMessage ZkbTestMsg1 Set XMark1 to GetLinkedRef XMark1.Enable Endif Endif
End

scn ZkbHostileProspector01SCRIPT
begin onDeath ZkbAmbushGateActAREF.Disable ZkbAmbushGateActBREF.Disable ZkbAmbushGateActAREF.MarkForDelete ZkbAmbushGateActBREF.MarkForDelete End

Scn ZkbV616Level1Enable2SCRIPT
; Enables V616 enemies in level one
Begin OnTriggerEnter Player
ZkbV616Level1Mk2ACT.Enable ZkbV616Level1ACT2.Disable ZkbV616Level1ACT2.MarkForDelete
End

scn ZKBV616Msg04SCRIPT
; Note activator begin onActivate
ShowMessage ZkbV616Msg04
end

Scn ZkbAntiSocialSCRIPT
; Makes linked NPC aggresive to everyone
ref Prisoner
Begin OnTriggerEnter Player
set Prisoner to getLinkedRef Prisoner.damageAV braincondition 100
End

scn ZkbHayfordBarSCRIPT
begin OnTrigger Player
If ZkbKarenMyersREF.GetInCell ZkbHayfordTrainStationBar == 1 ZkbStnBarShutterREF.Disable else ZkbStnBarShutterREF.Enable Endif
End

scn ZkbKarenMyersQuest01Script
short ZeroSet short MetKaren short KMPissedOff short KMGrumpyDate
Begin GameMode
If (ZeroSet != 1) Set MetKaren to 0 Set KMPissedOff to 0 Set KMGrumpyDate to 0 Set ZeroSet to 1 Endif
If KMGrumpyDate + 2 <= GameDaysPassed Set KMPissedOff to 0 endif
End

scn ZKBWaterCurrent01Script
; water current to strong message begin ontrigger player
ShowMessage ZkbWaterCurrentMsg
end

ScriptName ZkbSwitchDelaySCRIPT
ref light
Begin OnActivate if light == 0 set light to GetLinkedRef endif
if light.GetDisabled light.Enable 10 else light.Disable 10 endif Activate End

scn ZkbVaultTrapTripwire01SCRIPT
; Triggers stonecase vault gas trap ref actionRef
begin onTriggerEnter
set actionRef to getActionRef
if actionRef.hasPerk LightStep == 0 activate playsound3D TRPTripwireLaser ZKBCarTunn02Door04.SetOpenState 0 Playsound DRSVaultGearOpenSteam01 ZkbCarTunnel02XMk04.Enable endif
end

scn ZkbBlinderGreetSCRIPT
Begin OnTriggerEnter Player
ZkbBlinderPokeREF.StartConversation player GREETING
End

scn ZkbWhiteLegAmbush01SCRIPT
; White Leg Activator
ref XMark1 int DoOnce
Begin OnTriggerEnter Player
If DoOnce == 0 ; ShowMessage ZkbTestMsg Set XMark1 to GetLinkedRef XMark1.Enable Set DoOnce to 1 Endif
End

scn ZkbRandomEncounter04SCRIPT
; Random encounter, active from start ; 50% chance of encounter
Short Chance ; Variable for chance of encounter ref XMark1
Begin OnTriggerEnter Player
If ZkbEncounterQuest.Encounter4 == 0 Set ZkbEncounterQuest.Encounter4 to 1 Set ZkbEncounterQuest.Date4 to GameDaysPassed + 1 Set Chance to 1 + GetRandomPercent * 2 / 100 If Chance == 2 ; ShowMessage ZkbTestMsg1 Set XMark1 to GetLinkedRef XMark1.Enable Endif Endif
End

scn ZkbRebreatherScript
; Edited rebreather script
int iEquipped
begin OnEquip player player.AddSpell VMS15WaterBreathingActual set iEquipped to 1 end
;begin onUnequip player ; player.RemoveSpell VMS15WaterBreathingActual ;end
begin GameMode if iEquipped == 1 && Player.GetEquipped ZkbRebreather == 0 player.RemoveSpell VMS15WaterBreathingActual set iEquipped to 0 endif end

ESP.ORIGINAL:
This Terminal will remove all Zion Trail Notes and store them in the box once if the particular quest plus associated quests (there are Passwords in different quests) are complete
For those who do not like clutter on their Pipboy
ESP.TRADUIT:
一旦特定的任务和相关的任务(在不同的任务中有密码)完成，这个终端将删除所有锡安小径笔记，并将它们存储在盒子中。
给那些不喜欢Pip-Boy上太凌乱的人
