Told you, stuck your nose into where is doesn't belong and you got zapped by my burglar alarm. Now what did I tell you when you first arrived?
ESP.TRADUIT: 说过了，你去了不该去的地方，被我的防盗报警器击中了。你刚来的时候我怎么跟你说的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalkQ_0002136B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, If only it was that easy
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，要是有那么简单就好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalkQ_0002136D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: From inside a cage? Ever heard the phrase; situational awareness? You need to work on that
ESP.TRADUIT: 从笼子里？你听过态势感知这个词吗？你需要在这方面下点功夫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalkQ_0002136E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: OK, I screwed up. Can we work a deal here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我搞砸了。我们能在这里做个交易吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe we can, you do seem to be a pretty determine character and you have managed to find our 'Ground House' mystery tunnel
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我们可以，你看起来确实是一个非常坚定的人物，你已经设法找到了我们的“地上小屋”神秘隧道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalkQ_0002136F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think your options are limited here
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalkQ_00021370_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is a place, a field above the waterfall. We use to keep Lurks there. Mean critters but they taste good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 瀑布上方有个地方，一片田。我们曾经在那里养过沼蟹，卑鄙的小动物，但它们味道很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalkQ_00021371_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But there was a problem, there are these weird poisonous plants. They have always been around but they were becoming a problem. Killing hatchlings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但有一个问题，那里有一些奇怪的有毒植物。它们一直都存在，但它们正在成为一个问题，杀害孵化的幼苗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalkQ_00021371_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Non of us saw that one coming. Granted we made the assumption they were what's left of the raiders, although they did seem slightly more intelligent
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们没有人看到这一幕的发生。我们假设他们是剩下的掠夺者，尽管他们看起来稍微聪明一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalkQ_00021371_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The deal is this; you go up there kill all of these creatures and the plants and then we will see about cutting you in on our mystery tunnel
ESP.TRADUIT: 交易是这样的：你上去杀了所有的生物和植物，然后我们再考虑把你带进我们的神秘通道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalkQ_00021372_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set ZkbPokeQuest01.Thief to 2 ; Variable to control which packages run Player.AddNote ZkbBlinderQuestANote1 Player.AddItem ZkbKeyRCCave 1 ZkbRCJailDoorREF.Unlock ; Jail cell door ZkbRCShack06DoorInt.Unlock ; Sheriffs office int door ZkbBlinderPokeREF.AddItem GlassesNCRRangerCivilian 1 SetStage ZkbWaterFieldQuest 10 ZkbBlinderPokeREF.evp ZkbPearsonBentREF.evp
It's Done. Lillypad field is cleared of those things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 完成了，睡莲叶田里的那些东西都被清除了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, you've proved yourself. So the deal is this, if you get into our little vault you can walk out with whatever you can carry, the rest is ours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，你证明了自己。我们的协议是这样的，如果你进入我们的避难所你可以带着你能携带的任何东西走出来，剩下的都是我们的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalkQ_0002199D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what's with all the junk by the way?
ESP.TRADUIT: 顺便问一下，这些垃圾是怎么回事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a scientist, these are my instruments....Stop giggling
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是个科学家，这些是我的仪器...别笑了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueNeville\ZkbNeville_ZkbNeville53_000215A1_1.ogg

NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderGoodb_00029F14_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for a place to crash, is this a hotel?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想找一个地方睡觉，这是个旅馆吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nearest you're gonna get to it in these parts
ESP.TRADUIT: 这一带你能找到的最接近它的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalk0_00029F17_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Prices are on the board, read them. If you can't read take a guess. You want a one bed cage or a two? Or just a bed?
ESP.TRADUIT: 价格就在黑板上，自己看，如果你不识字，就猜一猜。你要一张床的还是两张床的？还是只要张床？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalk0_00029F17_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A cage? is a room too much to ask for?
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个笼子？一个房间的要求太高了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah it is. So is on suite facilities, room service and pleasant after dinner conversation. So what it's to be?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，套房设施、客房服务和愉快的晚餐后谈话也是如此。所以要什么呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalk0_00029F18_1.ogg

NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalk0_00029F1C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll take the one bed cage
Ok, Cage E. It's down there, fifth cage
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，E号笼子，在下面，第五个笼子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalk0_00029F1D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ZkbRCHotelCageEREF.Unlock ZkbRCHotelBedE1REF.SetOwnership Set ZkbPokeQuest01.CageE to 1 player.RemoveItem Caps001 40
I'll need the two bed cage
Sure, Cage B, down there second on the right
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，B号笼子，下面右边第二个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalk0_00029F1E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ZkbRCHotelCageBREF.Unlock ZkbRCHotelBedB1REF.SetOwnership ZkbRCHotelBedB2REF.SetOwnership DontTazeMeBroFaction Set ZkbPokeQuest01.CageB to 1 player.RemoveItem Caps001 60
Go right down the end, cage H. Take any one free
ESP.TRADUIT: 从那头下去，H号笼子，随便找一个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalk0_0002AC4B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ZkbRCHotelBedH1REF.SetOwnership ZkbRCHotelBedH2REF.SetOwnership DontTazeMeBroFaction ZkbRCHotelBedH3REF.SetOwnership DontTazeMeBroFaction Set ZkbPokeQuest01.CageH to 1 player.RemoveItem Caps001 20
Not really, I'm more wholesale. Bill up on the road is your best bet for clothing and weapons, or John for parts, junk and general repairs
ESP.TRADUIT: 不做，我更喜欢批发。买衣服和武器最好的选择是路上的比尔，买零件、垃圾和一般修理最好的选择则是约翰。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalk1_0002B9A8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I ask you some questions?
Knock yourself out, but I don't guarantee an answer
ESP.TRADUIT: 请便，但我不保证会有答案。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalk1_0002B9AA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you get any other groups up this way?

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalk2_0002B9AE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How come this place is here?
Can't think of a better place for it
ESP.TRADUIT: 想不到有比这更好的地方了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalk2_0002B9AF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ever come across a vault around these parts?

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalkQ_0002B9B0_1.ogg

NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalkQ_0003A0FA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How far is Zion from here?
About two or three days walk. Keep going north, just watch out for the wildlife.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大约走两三天。继续往北走，小心野生动物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalk2_0002B9B3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rarely and those are generally deserters, lost or most likely both
ESP.TRADUIT: 很少。而那些人一般都是逃兵、迷路者，或者可能两者都是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalk3_0002B9BA_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 有没有遇到过凯撒军团？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm, Legion, vicious, wear skirts and don't make any sense if you talk to them. Sounds like a lot of the women I've known. None here though
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯...军团，凶恶，穿裙子，如果你和他们说话，没有任何意义，听起来像是我认识的很多女人。不过这里没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalk3_0002B9BF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you heard of Mr House up this far north?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这么北的地方听说过豪斯先生吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course we have, everyone knows about Vegas and the strip
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然了，大家都知道拉斯维加斯和长街。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalk3_0002B9BE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for House I heard he is actually a pre-war computer. Probably spends all day in that tower of his de-fragmenting himself
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于豪斯，我听说他实际上是一台战前的电脑。可能整天都在他的塔里给自己去碎片化。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalk3_0002B9BE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thankfully no. Someone who married their own sister should never have artillery. Or children. Or anything else for that matter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 值得庆幸的是没有。和自己的亲妹妹结婚的人不应该有大炮，或者孩子，或者其他任何东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalk3_0002B9BB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seen any Brotherhood of Steel in these parts?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这一带看到过钢铁兄弟会吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Haven't seen them around for a long time. Probably disappeared down a hole, best place for them if you ask me
ESP.TRADUIT: 很久没见到他们了。可能消失在一个洞里了，要我说，那是最适合他们的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalk3_0002B9BD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are there any Followers of the Apocalypse around here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这附近有天启追随者吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, up on the road in the big wooden shack, or medical center as some call it. Louise is good, just a bit frosty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，在路上的一个大木屋里，有人叫它医疗中心。露易丝人很好，就是有点冷淡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalk3_0002B9BC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're looking for someone to shoot at, there is the Mayor or the Sheriff or both if you have had a bad day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想找个人开枪，你可以找市长或警长，如果你今天过得不好，也可以两个都找。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalk4_0002B9C1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No where, it's collapsed further on down. No treasure, no zombies, no where and nothing
ESP.TRADUIT: 哪儿也不是，它已经塌了。没有宝藏，没有僵尸，没有目的地，什么都没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalk2_0002C686_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So if this is Rita's Cafe, where is Rita?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，如果这里是丽塔咖啡馆，丽塔在哪里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Down the hall, fourth on the right
ESP.TRADUIT: 顺着走廊走，右边第四个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalk4_0002C68D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How have you got this far being that stupid?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这么蠢是怎么走到今天的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalk4_0002C690_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You haven't asked me anything, don't you want to know what's happening down south?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你什么都没问我，难道你不想知道南方发生了什么吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all people talk about around here. Anyway, I don't need to, see that box that makes noise behind me? It's called a radio
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里的人都在谈论这个。总之，我不需要，看到我身后那个发出声音的盒子了吗？它叫收音机。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalk4_0002C691_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unlike you it has the added advantage of having an off switch
ESP.TRADUIT: 与你不同，它有一个额外的优点，那就是有开关。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalk4_0002C691_2.ogg
NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell is wrong with your voice? and why are you so small?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的声音到底是怎么了？还有，你为什么这么小？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not small, I'm compact and there is nothing is wrong with my voice. Now are you prepared to die?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不小，我结构紧凑，我的声音没有问题。现在你准备好去死了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueNeville\ZkbNeville_ZkbNeville03_000300E8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not sure, you're not wearing a label
Welcome to the Quarry, we don't see many humans alive around here, not that you will be much longer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎来到采石场，我们在这附近看不到多少活着的人类，你也活不了多久了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueNeville\ZkbNeville_ZkbNeville01_000300E6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, seriously, you have to be having a laugh, literally, is that helium in that mask?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，说真的，你一定是在笑，真的，那面具里是氦气吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, as a matter of fact. Its a medical condition, I suffer from helium deficiency and I would thank you not to mention it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，事实上，这是一种疾病，我患有氦缺乏症，我希望你不要提这事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueNeville\ZkbNeville_ZkbNeville04_000300EE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is no such thing as helium deficiency, and that shit is dangerous
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有缺氦这回事，而且那玩意很危险。

ESP.ORIGINAL: For humans perhaps, but I am a mutant and the conversion process...had some hiccups.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对人类来说也许是，但我是个变种人，我的转化过程...有一些小插曲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueNeville\ZkbNeville_ZkbNeville05_000300EF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's not a hiccup, its a full blown fuck up. So you are a failed FEV subject?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是小插曲，这是完全搞砸了。所以你是一个失败的FEV项目？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't like the word failed, it has such negative connotations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不喜欢失败这个词，它的含义太负面了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueNeville\ZkbNeville_ZkbNeville06_000300F0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well you sure as shit wasn't a success
ESP.TRADUIT: 你肯定不是一个成功的例子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I'm about to kill you so can we cut out the small talk? Any last words?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我马上就要杀了你，所以我们能不能别闲聊了？有遗言吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Anger NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueNeville\ZkbNeville_ZkbNeville07_000300F1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well aren't you the vindictive one. Let me guess, one munchkin joke too many?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你不是个报复心很强的人吗？让我猜猜，一个小矮人笑话太多了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, that and they are planning to get rid of me. It seems they don't think I'm projecting the right kind of image for a Super Mutant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，而且他们正计划除掉我，他们似乎觉得我的形象不适合超级变种人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueNeville\ZkbNeville_ZkbNeville31_00031370_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I think you need to be put out of your misery [Attack]
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我认为需要结束你的痛苦[攻击]。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueNeville\ZkbNeville_ZkbNeville10_00030D3C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, What do you call a green Nightkin?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，你怎么称呼一个绿色的夜行族？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueNeville\ZkbNeville_ZkbNeville11_00030D3D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you deliberate trying to antagonise me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是故意要跟我作对吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Anger NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueNeville\ZkbNeville_ZkbNeville12_00030D45_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not deliberate, I just can't help myself. Now say you are going to rip my arms off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是故意的，我就是控制不住自己，现在说你要把我的胳膊扯下来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now you want me to threaten you?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueNeville\ZkbNeville_ZkbNeville13_00030D46_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, I've never been threatened by a munchkin before, this is priceless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我从来没被小矮人威胁过，这可是无价之宝。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen, I'm trying to intimidate and kill you and its not easy with my disadvantages
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我正试图恐吓和杀死你，以我的劣势，这并不容易！你知道吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Sad NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueNeville\ZkbNeville_ZkbNeville14_00030D47_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So will you please throw me a frigin bone here and at least try to look worried.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你能不能给我点面子，至少装出一副害怕的样子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueNeville\ZkbNeville_ZkbNeville14_00030D47_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry about that, will it help if I stop laughing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 很抱歉，如果我不笑了，会好点吗？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueNeville\ZkbNeville_ZkbNeville15_00030D49_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't be bothered now. I've lost the moment and am too disillusioned.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在没空。我失去了那一刻，我的幻想破灭了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Sad NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueNeville\ZkbNeville_ZkbNeville16_00030D4A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you have gone from killing me to depressing me, that's a hell of a jump for one conversation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你从杀了我变成让我沮丧了，就一次谈话来说，这真是个巨大的转变。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen, you don't seemed to be fazed by Mutants, would you be interested in some work at all?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，你似乎没有被变种人吓倒，你会对一些工作感兴趣吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueNeville\ZkbNeville_ZkbNeville17_00030D4B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got it, find bad guys, kill bad guys, get money. Any chance of a song before I go?
ESP.TRADUIT: 明白了，找坏人，杀坏人，拿钱。在我走之前能给我来首歌吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am consoled by the knowledge they will probably kill you first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很欣慰他们可能会先杀了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueNeville\ZkbNeville_ZkbNeville33_00031373_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Setstage ZkbNevilleTaskQuest01 20 Set ZkbNevilleQuest01.JobNev to 1
If ZkbNevilleQuest01.KilledFent == 1 ShowMessage ZkbFentDeadMessage SetObjectiveCompleted ZkbNevilleTaskQuest01 21 1 endif
If ZkbNevilleQuest01.KilledDixie == 1 ShowMessage ZkbDixieDeadMessage SetObjectiveCompleted ZkbNevilleTaskQuest01 22 1 endif
If ZkbNevilleQuest01.KilledBenz == 1 ShowMessage ZkbBenzDeadMessage SetObjectiveCompleted ZkbNevilleTaskQuest01 23 1 endif
You are offering me work? Have you not noticed I've already fragged a most of your buddies
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要给我工作？你没注意到我已经把你的大部分朋友打烂了吗。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? They were not really my friends and they also seemed to find my 'condition' amusing. So..fuck em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？他们并不是我真正的朋友，他们似乎也觉得我的“状况”很有趣。所以...去他妈的吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueNeville\ZkbNeville_ZkbNeville20_00030D4F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, since you have already solved that problem for me here is a little reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，既然你已经帮我解决了这个问题，给你一点奖励。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueNeville\ZkbNeville_ZkbNeville20_00030D4F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Its the key to Fent's workshop. Its where those idiots stashed their shiny things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是芬特工作室的钥匙。那帮白痴把闪闪发亮的东西藏在那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueNeville\ZkbNeville_ZkbNeville20_00030D4F_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks, do you know if you were a Nightkin you would be called Neville the Smurf
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢，你知道吗，如果你是夜行族你会被叫做蓝精灵内维尔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope you get eaten by a Deathclaw
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你被死亡爪吃掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueNeville\ZkbNeville_ZkbNeville21_0003136F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem ZkbKeyFents 1 ZkbNevilleREF.Removeitem ZkbKeyFents 1 StopQuest ZkbNevilleTaskQuest01
I can see their point, but what's in it for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白他们的意思，但这对我有什么好处？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Their ill gotten gains. They keep it in Fent's so called workshop and I've made a copy of the key.
ESP.TRADUIT: 都是他们的不义之财。他们把它放在芬特所谓的工作室里，我复制了一把钥匙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueNeville\ZkbNeville_ZkbNeville32_00031371_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fent hides the other one so don't bother looking for it. Kill them and you get the key.
ESP.TRADUIT: 芬特把另一把藏起来了，所以不用费心找了。杀了他们，你就能拿到钥匙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueNeville\ZkbNeville_ZkbNeville32_00031371_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can find them either around the quarry or the poison pond just to the west of here, but they shouldn't be too far away
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以在采石场或西面的毒池附近找到它们，但它们应该离得不远。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueNeville\ZkbNeville_ZkbNeville32_00031371_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So is this job cookie related?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，这份工作和饼干有关吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Err no, well you may or may not have noticed there are quite a few other mutants in this quarry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...不，你可能已经注意到了，在这个采石场还有不少其他变种人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueNeville\ZkbNeville_ZkbNeville30_00030D52_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well I want you to kill them, three of them in particular. Benz, Dr Fent and Dixie the Troll
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我要你杀了他们，特别是其中三个：本茨，芬特博士和巨魔迪克西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueNeville\ZkbNeville_ZkbNeville30_00030D52_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No thanks, its been fun and I really mean that, but I need to be going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不了，谢谢，这很有趣，我是认真的，但我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, the offer is open if you change your mind
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，如果你改变主意，这个报价长期有效。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Neville [0502E25B] (mod) Quest : ([050300E3]ZkbNevilleQuest01) Neville Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueNeville\ZkbNeville_ZkbNeville40_00030D54_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me again, before, you mentioned a job remember?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还是我，你之前提到过一份工作，记得吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Job done, all Super Mutants with mean, macho, deep voices done in. Am I scaring you now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 大功告成，所有的超级变种人都有了刻薄，男子气概，低沉的声音。我现在吓到你了吗？

ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，我的钥匙和你的胜利演说如何？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here is the key now fuck off.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I take it this is a kind of junk shop
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜这是一种旧货商店。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gathering junk is not the most exiting work, but its a living
ESP.TRADUIT: 收集垃圾并不是最令人兴奋的工作，但却是一种生活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Howie [050174F4] (mod) Quest : ([05032FDE]ZkbHowieQuest01) John Howie Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : John Howie [050174F4] (mod) Quest : ([05032FDE]ZkbHowieQuest01) John Howie Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\MaleAdult04\ZkbHowieQu_ZkbHowieTalk02_00032FF5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If your down on you're luck and need some caps I buy just about anything. Of course, we also have plenty of things for sale too
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你运气不好，需要一些瓶盖，我收任何东西。当然，我们也有很多东西出售。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Howie [050174F4] (mod) Quest : ([05032FDE]ZkbHowieQuest01) John Howie Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : John Howie [050174F4] (mod) Quest : ([05032FDE]ZkbHowieQuest01) John Howie Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\MaleAdult04\ZkbHowieQu_ZkbHowieTalk02_00032FF5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: NCR should head back to their lands, I'm sure their people miss them
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR应该回到他们的土地上，我肯定他们的人民想念他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Howie [050174F4] (mod) Quest : ([05032FDE]ZkbHowieQuest01) John Howie Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : John Howie [050174F4] (mod) Quest : ([05032FDE]ZkbHowieQuest01) John Howie Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\MaleAdult04\ZkbHowieQu_ZkbHowieTalk11_00032FFB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was that a Zion tribal I saw wandering around?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看到在周围游荡的是锡安部落吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We tolerate wasteland savages, as long as they respect our rule around here
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们容忍废土上的野蛮人，只要他们尊重我们的统治。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Howie [050174F4] (mod) Quest : ([05032FDE]ZkbHowieQuest01) John Howie Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : John Howie [050174F4] (mod) Quest : ([05032FDE]ZkbHowieQuest01) John Howie Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\MaleAdult04\ZkbHowieQu_ZkbHowieTalk12_00032FFC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any dealings with Vegas this far north?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这么远的北方，你和拉斯维加斯有什么往来吗？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Howie [050174F4] (mod) Quest : ([05032FDE]ZkbHowieQuest01) John Howie Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : John Howie [050174F4] (mod) Quest : ([05032FDE]ZkbHowieQuest01) John Howie Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\MaleAdult04\ZkbHowieQu_ZkbHowieTalk13_00033002_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Surely these 'savages' have as much right to be here as you have
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，这些‘野蛮人’和你一样有权呆在这里。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Howie [050174F4] (mod) Quest : ([05032FDE]ZkbHowieQuest01) John Howie Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : John Howie [050174F4] (mod) Quest : ([05032FDE]ZkbHowieQuest01) John Howie Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\MaleAdult04\ZkbHowieQu_ZkbHowieTalk22_00032FFF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well that's ok, cause I'm not one of them
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系，因为我不是他们中的一员。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's about time a new customer showed up around here, I was getting sick of dealing with the same faces all the time
ESP.TRADUIT: 是时候来个新客户了，我已经厌倦了总是和同样的人打交道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Howie [050174F4] (mod) Quest : ([05032FDE]ZkbHowieQuest01) John Howie Dialog EmotionType : Happy NPC : John Howie [050174F4] (mod) Quest : ([05032FDE]ZkbHowieQuest01) John Howie Dialog EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\MaleAdult04\ZkbHowieQu_ZkbHowieTalk21_00033001_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Twice, both times I drank a lot of liquor and lots most of my caps at the card tables, in that order now that I think about it
ESP.TRADUIT: 有两次，两次在牌桌上我都喝了很多酒，很多瓶盖，现在我想是这个顺序。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Howie [050174F4] (mod) Quest : ([05032FDE]ZkbHowieQuest01) John Howie Dialog EmotionType : Happy NPC : John Howie [050174F4] (mod) Quest : ([05032FDE]ZkbHowieQuest01) John Howie Dialog EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\MaleAdult04\ZkbHowieQu_ZkbHowieTalk23_00033004_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know this area well?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对这个地区很熟悉吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything around here that I should know about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这附近有什么我应该知道的事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what are you here for?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Angel Lewis [05017C4C] (mod) Quest : ([05032254]ZkbAngelQuest01) Angel Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Angel Lewis [05017C4C] (mod) Quest : ([05032254]ZkbAngelQuest01) Angel Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult01Default\ZkbAngelQu_ZkbAngelTalk02_000335FC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, say no more, give me a shout if you need anything else
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，不要再说了，如果你还需要什么就叫我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Angel Lewis [05017C4C] (mod) Quest : ([05032254]ZkbAngelQuest01) Angel Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Angel Lewis [05017C4C] (mod) Quest : ([05032254]ZkbAngelQuest01) Angel Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult01Default\ZkbAngelQu_ZkbAngelTalk03_000335FD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Adventure, fame, riches, all the usual stuff
ESP.TRADUIT: 冒险，名声，财富，所有的一切。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you come across any NCR this far north?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这么北的地方遇到过NCR吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ever come across Legion around here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这附近见过军团吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, I'm done, I'll see you around

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Angel Lewis [05017C4C] (mod) Quest : ([05032254]ZkbAngelQuest01) Angel Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Angel Lewis [05017C4C] (mod) Quest : ([05032254]ZkbAngelQuest01) Angel Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult01Default\ZkbAngelQu_ZkbAngelGoodBye_00033604_1.ogg

NPC : Angel Lewis [05017C4C] (mod) Quest : ([05032254]ZkbAngelQuest01) Angel Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Angel Lewis [05017C4C] (mod) Quest : ([05032254]ZkbAngelQuest01) Angel Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult01Default\ZkbAngelQu_ZkbAngelGoodBye_00033605_1.ogg

NPC : Angel Lewis [05017C4C] (mod) Quest : ([05032254]ZkbAngelQuest01) Angel Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Angel Lewis [05017C4C] (mod) Quest : ([05032254]ZkbAngelQuest01) Angel Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult01Default\ZkbAngelQu_ZkbAngelGoodBye_00033606_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know anything about a vault in these parts?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道这里有个避难所吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear rumours, thats about it
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听到一些传言，就这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Angel Lewis [05017C4C] (mod) Quest : ([05032254]ZkbAngelQuest01) Angel Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Angel Lewis [05017C4C] (mod) Quest : ([05032254]ZkbAngelQuest01) Angel Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult01Default\ZkbAngelQu_ZkbAngelTalk11_0003360C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] your guess is as good as mine, probably better. I wouldn't head that direction if I were you though
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]你的猜测和我的一样，也许更好。如果我是你，我不会往那个方向去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Angel Lewis [05017C4C] (mod) Quest : ([05032254]ZkbAngelQuest01) Angel Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Angel Lewis [05017C4C] (mod) Quest : ([05032254]ZkbAngelQuest01) Angel Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult01Default\ZkbAngelQu_ZkbAngelTalk12_0003360D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] I haven't heard nothing, I should get back to work
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]我什么都没听到，我应该回去工作了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Angel Lewis [05017C4C] (mod) Quest : ([05032254]ZkbAngelQuest01) Angel Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Angel Lewis [05017C4C] (mod) Quest : ([05032254]ZkbAngelQuest01) Angel Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult01Default\ZkbAngelQu_ZkbAngelTalk12_0003360E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Which direction is that? So there is a vault then...
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是哪个方向？ 所以有一个避难所然后...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh um ok, If you really want to know ... Yes
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，如果你真的想知道...是的...
