No, well not really. What do you want with me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不...嗯，算不上。你想对我做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Angel Lewis [05017C4C] (mod) Quest : ([05032254]ZkbAngelQuest01) Angel Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Angel Lewis [05017C4C] (mod) Quest : ([05032254]ZkbAngelQuest01) Angel Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult01Default\ZkbAngelQu_ZkbAngelTalk14_00033610_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So why pretend to be ignorant of it? What's wrong with this place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，为什么要假装不知道呢？这地方怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That will do, I've seen better
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就可以了，我见过更好的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I don't have anything you like, well, tough, I don't do special orders
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我没有你喜欢的东西，那就难办了。我不做特别订单。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Howie [050174F4] (mod) Quest : ([05032FDE]ZkbHowieQuest01) John Howie Dialog EmotionType : Anger NPC : John Howie [050174F4] (mod) Quest : ([05032FDE]ZkbHowieQuest01) John Howie Dialog EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\MaleAdult04\ZkbHowieQu_ZkbHowieTalk31_00033679_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, I'm just telling it like it is
You're not exactly making friends around here are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不是来这儿交朋友的，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Howie [050174F4] (mod) Quest : ([05032FDE]ZkbHowieQuest01) John Howie Dialog EmotionType : Anger NPC : John Howie [050174F4] (mod) Quest : ([05032FDE]ZkbHowieQuest01) John Howie Dialog EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\MaleAdult04\ZkbHowieQu_ZkbHowieTalk32_0003367B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set ZkbHowieQuest01.JHPissedOff to 1 Set ZkbHowieQuest01.JHGrumpyDate to GameDaysPassed ZkbHowieWorkBenchBoxREF.Enable
Nice place you live in, great water features and you're own railway
ESP.TRADUIT: 你住的地方不错，有很棒的水景，还有自己的铁路。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're kind of odd aren't you
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Howie [050174F4] (mod) Quest : ([05032FDE]ZkbHowieQuest01) John Howie Dialog EmotionType : Surprise NPC : John Howie [050174F4] (mod) Quest : ([05032FDE]ZkbHowieQuest01) John Howie Dialog EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\MaleAdult04\ZkbHowieQu_ZkbHowieTalk14_00033684_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know Zion? Is this the right road?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道锡安吗？这条路是对的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, Just follow the road north and keep an eye out for wildlife
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，顺着路往北走，注意野生动物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Angel Lewis [05017C4C] (mod) Quest : ([05032254]ZkbAngelQuest01) Angel Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Angel Lewis [05017C4C] (mod) Quest : ([05032254]ZkbAngelQuest01) Angel Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult01Default\ZkbAngelQu_ZkbAngelTalk07_00033C86_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is this place a flop house?

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Karen Myers [0501E3BE] (mod) Quest : ([050565C4]ZkbKarenMyersQuest01) Karen Myers Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Karen Myers [0501E3BE] (mod) Quest : ([050565C4]ZkbKarenMyersQuest01) Karen Myers Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult02\ZkbKarenMy_ZkbKarenMTalk51_00034CC4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So there is no problem with resting up and crashing here then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以在这里休息和住宿没有问题吗？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Karen Myers [0501E3BE] (mod) Quest : ([050565C4]ZkbKarenMyersQuest01) Karen Myers Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Karen Myers [0501E3BE] (mod) Quest : ([050565C4]ZkbKarenMyersQuest01) Karen Myers Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult02\ZkbKarenMy_ZkbKarenMTalk52_00034CC5_1.ogg

NPC : Angel Lewis [05017C4C] (mod) Quest : ([05032254]ZkbAngelQuest01) Angel Dialog EmotionType : Puzzled NPC : Angel Lewis [05017C4C] (mod) Quest : ([05032254]ZkbAngelQuest01) Angel Dialog EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult01Default\ZkbAngelQu_ZkbAngelTalk21_00035E59_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm guessing a lot of folk from around here came from in there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜这里的很多人都是从那里来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know the place was all screwed up, but why are you so tight lipped about it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道那地方被搞得一团糟，但你为什么对此事讳莫如深？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, that was rude, I didn't mean to sound ungrateful
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，那太无礼了，我不是故意要显得不领情的。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Howie [050174F4] (mod) Quest : ([05032FDE]ZkbHowieQuest01) John Howie Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : John Howie [050174F4] (mod) Quest : ([05032FDE]ZkbHowieQuest01) John Howie Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\MaleAdult04\ZkbHowieQu_ZkbHowieTalk33_00037370_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would really appreciate it if I could borrow your work bench, I won't be long
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我能借用你的工作台，我将非常感激，我不会待很久。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Howie [050174F4] (mod) Quest : ([05032FDE]ZkbHowieQuest01) John Howie Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : John Howie [050174F4] (mod) Quest : ([05032FDE]ZkbHowieQuest01) John Howie Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\MaleAdult04\ZkbHowieQu_ZkbHowieWorkBen_00037372_1.ogg

NPC : John Howie [050174F4] (mod) Quest : ([05032FDE]ZkbHowieQuest01) John Howie Dialog EmotionType : Puzzled NPC : John Howie [050174F4] (mod) Quest : ([05032FDE]ZkbHowieQuest01) John Howie Dialog EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\MaleAdult04\ZkbHowieQu_ZkbHowieWorkBen_00037373_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: 100 caps for killing this Ris character you said, if the offer is still open I'm in
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说过杀了丽斯给一百个瓶盖，如果还有效，我就加入。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come see me when you are done
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayTalk37_0003757C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So how come you are here?

ESP.TRADUIT: 每个人都有自己的位置。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalk2_00037FF4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Rumour is that Vaults are bad news, when the road swings north stay out of any train yards you come across.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]有传言说避难所很晦气，当公路向北延伸时，要远离你遇到的任何火车场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayTalk51_00038519_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: if GetStage ZkbVault616Quest01 == 20 SetStage ZkbVault616Quest01 30 endif
A man in your position makes it his business to hear things, how about you share the rumour?
ESP.TRADUIT: 像你这种地位的人总是喜欢听传闻，不如你来分享传言吧？
[失败]那是你的问题，不是我的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Anger NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayTalk51_0003851A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, can I use your reloading bench? You would really be helping me out
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能用下你的弹药工作台吗？你真是帮了我大忙了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill Pancake [0501B6A8] (mod) Quest : ([0503148B]ZkbPancakeQuest01) Bill Pancake Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Bill Pancake [0501B6A8] (mod) Quest : ([0503148B]ZkbPancakeQuest01) Bill Pancake Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\MaleAdult06\ZkbPancake_ZkbPancakeAmmoB_00038633_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever you need, here's a list. Let me know what grabs you
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论你需要什么，这是一张清单。让我知道什么能吸引你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayTrade_00038BC7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need some stuff fixing, can you manage that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要修理一些东西，你能行吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course I can, for a price.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我当然可以，但是要支付报酬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayFix_00038BC4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay safe and remember, You and your money is always welcome here
ESP.TRADUIT: 注意安全，记住，这里永远欢迎你和你的钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayGoodby_00038BC5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, come back when you have some more money
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，等你有了更多的钱再回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayGoodby_000391E2_1.ogg

NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayGoodby_000391E3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you can help me, I'm after some information
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你能帮助我，我在寻找一些信息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah Information, easy to transport and often expensive, are we trading?
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，信息！运输简单，价格很贵，要交易吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayTalk_00038BC6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Burgess? I think I've already killed him
ESP.TRADUIT: 伯吉斯？我想我已经把他杀了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayQBur04_00038E42_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] I guess secrets do have a sell by date don't they? Forget it, its south of here, you've walked past it. That's a good thing
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]我想秘密是有保质期的，不是吗？算了吧，在南边，你已经走过了。这是一件好事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalkQ_00039844_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: if GetStage ZkbVault616Quest01 == 20 SetStage ZkbVault616Quest01 30 endif
Are you telling me you don't know what every prospector north of Vegas is looking for?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是说你不知道北维加斯的淘金客在找什么吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Well, if you already know, you don't need me
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]好吧，如果你已经知道了，那就不需要我了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Puzzled NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalkQ_00039845_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't lie to me, I already know about it

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayGoodby_000398AB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If ZkbKillRisQuest01.Job01BRay == 3 Player.AddItem Caps001 100 Set ZkbKillRisQuest01.Job01BRay to 4 Endif If ZkbBurgessTaskQuest01.Job02BRay == 1 SetStage ZkbBurgessTaskQuest01 90 Endif
So what is there around these parts?
Same shit you find everywhere else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和你在其他地方看到的一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayTalk01_000398AD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I meant what has Hayford got to offer
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是说海福德能提供什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hotel, lounge, bar and casino? You mean the flop house?
ESP.TRADUIT: 酒店、休息室、酒吧和赌场？你是说低价旅店吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can get a drink there, that means it's a bar
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以在那里喝上一杯，这意味着它是一个酒吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayTalk10_000398B6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And there are a pair of slot machines in there, so its a casino, at least if they worked anyway
ESP.TRADUIT: 那里有一对老虎机，所以这是一个赌场，如果它们能用的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayTalk10_000398B6_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about the rest of Hayford
Well, the Myers live in the house on the south edge, they farm
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，迈尔斯家住在南边的房子里，他们是农场主。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayTalk03_000398BC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave the house north of here alone. The old boy that lived there booby trapped the place. He wasn't much of a people person
ESP.TRADUIT: 远离北边的房子，住在那里的老男孩设了陷阱。他不太喜欢人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayTalk03_000398BC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And be careful of the house in the north west corner as well. Burgess lives in there and he's mean and very unsociable. Fine qualities in a man
ESP.TRADUIT: 对西北角的房子也要小心。伯吉斯住在那里，他很刻薄，非常不合群。这是一个人的优良品质。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayTalk03_000398BC_3.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 还有...没什么值得一提的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayTalk03_000398BC_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, I get it, you own the place, and north?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我明白，这地方是你的，北边呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice place, I love the wallpaper it looks just like piles of sandbags
ESP.TRADUIT: 不错的地方，我喜欢这个墙纸，看起来就像一堆沙袋。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you lived in a fireworks factory you would understand why
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你住在烟花工厂，你就会明白为什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayTalk20_000398C6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course not, although recently they have become a pain in the ass
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然没有，虽然最近他们变得很麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayTalk30_000398CA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A large group went through a while back and they didn't pay the toll, they just kicked the shit out of them
ESP.TRADUIT: 前一阵子有一大群人经过，他们没有付过路费，还把他们踢得屁滚尿流。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayTalk30_000398CA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Say, you wouldn't be interested in a job would you? You just have to kill her, if you're heading north you'll have to deal with her anyway
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说，你不会对一份工作感兴趣吧？你只要杀了她就行了，如果你要往北走，无论如何你都要和她打交道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayTalk30_000398CA_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think it best if you do your own dirty work
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得你最好还是自己干脏活。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do I look like some sort of wandering killer?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看起来像什么流浪杀手吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. 100 caps, once she is dead
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，一百瓶盖，只要她死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayTalk32_000398D1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What sort of people get this way?
Usual sort, one head, two legs, no money
ESP.TRADUIT: 平常的那种，一个头，两条腿，没有钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayTalk40_000398D9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you get any NCR up here?
Occasionally, they're like sand in a sandstorm, they get in everywhere
ESP.TRADUIT: 偶尔，它们就像沙尘暴中的沙子，无处不在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayTalk41_000398DB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They normally leave us alone, no taxes here for them
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们通常不会管我们，这里不给他们缴税。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog

ESP.TRADUIT: 有没有遇到过凯撒军团？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good money, bad dress sense and a nasty habit of nailing people to things
ESP.TRADUIT: 钱好赚，穿衣品味差，还有把人钉在东西上的讨厌习惯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayTalk42_000398DE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never seen them in these parts though
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayTalk42_000398DE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any dealings with the strip?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和长街有什么来往吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some, I trade with a lot of people
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一些，我和很多人做生意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayTalk43_000398E0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have boomers ever ventured up this way?
ESP.TRADUIT: 大炮族的人是否曾冒险走过这条路？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, probably too embarrassed about the name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，可能是名字太尴尬了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayTalk44_000398E2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A Classic wasteland example of a faction with a bigger arsenal than gene pool. Not a good combination
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一个典型的“废土”派系的例子，他们的兵工厂比基因库还大。这不是一个好的组合。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayTalk44_000398E2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ever heard of the brotherhood of Steel?
Not here. Need to go further north or back to Vegas to find one
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里没有，得往北走或者回维加斯去找。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayTalk46_000398DA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know anything about a vault around here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道这附近有什么避难所吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I haven't heard anything about any vault
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有，我没听说过什么避难所。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayTalk50_000398E7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Strange that, I've recently been to Vault 616 which nobody seems to know about
ESP.TRADUIT: 奇怪的是，我最近去的66号避难所似乎没人知道。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that right? Well if you say so
ESP.TRADUIT: 是这样吗？好吧，既然你这么说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Surprise NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalkQ_0003A0FC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So why is everyone denying they know anything about it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，为什么每个人都否认他们知道什么呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well why don't you tell me? You got one shot, get it right and I'll tell you
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你为什么不告诉我？你有一次机会，说对了，我就告诉你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Anger NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalkQ_0003A0FE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm guessing you trade with them, I just hate to think what you trade
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜你在和他们交易，我只是不愿意去想你在交易什么。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalkQ_0003A105_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You were planning to take the vault for yourself's, just didn't want to advertise it
ESP.TRADUIT: 你本来打算把避难所据为己有，只是不想大肆宣扬。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalkQ_0003A106_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You sold them your blood in exchange for protection
ESP.TRADUIT: 你把你的血卖给他们以换取保护！

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalkQ_0003A108_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I reckon a lot of you folk came from that vault and are not too proud of your history
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你们很多人都是那个避难所里的，对你们的历史并不感到骄傲。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aren't you the smart one. Sure some families around here escaped from there a while back, its not something they like to remember.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就是那个聪明人。确实，这里的一些家庭前一阵子从那里逃出来，这不是他们想要记住的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalkQ_0003A104_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're that interested there is some old diary entries in that terminal behind me, read them if you want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你感兴趣的话我身后的终端机里有一些旧日记，你想看就看吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalkQ_0003A104_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you all new about the experiments and wanted in, you wanted immortality
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你们都知道这个实验并想加入，想要获得永生。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalkQ_0003A109_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a little wired Doc, I think I might be addicted to something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 医生，我有点神经质，我想我可能对什么东西上瘾了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't say that's something I treat all the time, but I should have something to help you through it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不能说这是我经常治疗的病，但我应该有办法帮你渡过难关。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult06\ZkbDoctorI_ZkbDrInceAddict_0003A25D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: On second thought, I'll be fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 仔细想想，我不会有事的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not my clinical opinion, but so be it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是我的临床意见，但就这样吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult06\ZkbDoctorI_ZkbDrInceAddict_0003A25E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There, that's got it. Do be so eager to sample dangerous substances in the future, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，搞定了。 以后不要急于尝试危险物质，懂吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult06\ZkbDoctorI_ZkbDrInceAddict_0003A25F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ; set Begin Medical Services variable: setav variable01 2 Player.RemoveItem Caps001 50

ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，治好我。这里是50瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, my supplies are rather limited, and we can only get more by trading. Which requires money. Money you don't have. Come back when you have some.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，我的物资相当有限，我们只能通过交易来获得更多。这就需要钱，你没有钱的话，等有了再来吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult06\ZkbDoctorI_ZkbDrInceAddict_0003A260_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't afford treatment. I don't have 50 caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我负担不起治疗费用，我没有50瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a bit chewed up Doc, can you sort me out?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有点累了，医生，你能帮我解决一下吗？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult06\ZkbDoctorI_ZkbDrInceMedica_0003A261_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's not so bad. I should be able to treat you rather quickly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没那么糟糕，我应该能很快治好你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult06\ZkbDoctorI_ZkbDrInceMedica_0003A262_1.ogg

NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult06\ZkbDoctorI_ZkbDrInceMedica_0003A263_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got to get you treated quickly
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult06\ZkbDoctorI_ZkbDrInceMedica_0003A263_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry, but is that supposed to be a joke? There's nothing wrong with you. I can tell just by looking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不好意思，你是在开玩笑吗？你没有什么问题，我一看就知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult06\ZkbDoctorI_ZkbDrInceMedica_0003A264_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This might take a while. Close your eyes and try to relax, and we'll begin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这可能需要一段时间。闭上眼睛，放松，我们马上开始。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult06\ZkbDoctorI_ZkbDrInceMedica_0003A265_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm afraid protocol prevents me from treating you then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕按照规定我不能给你治疗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult06\ZkbDoctorI_ZkbDrInceMedica_0003A266_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This shouldn't take too long. Just close your eyes and relax.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不会花太长时间的。闭上眼睛，放松。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult06\ZkbDoctorI_ZkbDrInceMedica_0003A267_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm afraid protocol prevents me from treating you then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕按照规定我不能给你治疗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult06\ZkbDoctorI_ZkbDrInceMedica_0003A269_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This shouldn't take too long. Just close your eyes and relax.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不会花太长时间的。闭上眼睛，放松。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult06\ZkbDoctorI_ZkbDrInceMedica_0003A268_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm afraid protocol prevents me from treating you then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕按照规定我不能给你治疗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult06\ZkbDoctorI_ZkbDrInceMedica_0003A26A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I'll tough it out.
What? Why the hell would you do that? Are you insane?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？你为什么要这么做？你疯了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult06\ZkbDoctorI_ZkbDrInceMedica_0003A26B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you heal my radiation? I've got a warm fuzzy feeling, but not in a good way
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能治好我的辐射吗？我有一种温暖的模糊感觉，但不是好的感觉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We always make sure to keep an ample supply of Rad-Away
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们总是确保有充足的辐特宁供应。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult06\ZkbDoctorI_ZkbDrInceRadiat_0003A26C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Suit yourself. I'm sure there are ghouls and other mutants who once said the same thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随便你，我肯定有食尸鬼和其他变种人也说过同样的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult06\ZkbDoctorI_ZkbDrInceRadiat_0003A26D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here we go. You'll be rad-free in no time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们开始吧，你很快就不会有辐射了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult06\ZkbDoctorI_ZkbDrInceRadiat_0003A26E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then I can't help, sorry. Just following protocol.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我就无能为力了，抱歉。只是遵守规定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult06\ZkbDoctorI_ZkbDrInceRadiat_0003A26F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm after trading some medical supplies, you interested?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在交换一些医疗用品，你有兴趣吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose I have a few things around that I can spare.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我身边有些东西可以腾出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult06\ZkbDoctorI_ZkbDrInceSuppli_0003A270_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Relax, I thought this was a medical center, do you treat people here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 放松，我以为这是一个医疗中心，你在这里给人看病吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, if you are ever wounded I can treat you, for a fee
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，如果你受伤了，我可以给你治疗，但要收费。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult06\ZkbDoctorI_ZkbDrInceTalk01_0003A908_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We have equipment here to treat most physical injuries, lacerations, broken bones, that sort of thing. We also carry a full supply of anti-toxins
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们这里有设备可以治疗大部分的身体伤害，撕裂伤，骨折之类的。我们也有充足的抗毒素供应。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult06\ZkbDoctorI_ZkbDrInceTalk01_0003A908_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can also treat any form of radiation sickness you pick up out in the wastes, no matter what stage, save the last
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还可以治疗你在废土中遇到的任何形式的辐射病，无论在哪个阶段，除了最后一个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult06\ZkbDoctorI_ZkbDrInceTalk01_0003A908_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you don't give it away, you only treat people if they can pay
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你不免费，你只在人们付得起钱的时候给他们治疗。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult06\ZkbDoctorI_ZkbDrInceTalk02_0003A90C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is a fellah named Burgess, lives in a house on the north west corner, I may have mentioned him. He doesn't talk much
ESP.TRADUIT: 有个叫伯吉斯的家伙，住在西北角的房子里，我可能提过他。他话不多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayQBur02_0003AE94_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But he has been asking a lot of questions and seems to be collecting information, nothing specific just local stuff
ESP.TRADUIT: 但他一直在问很多问题，似乎在收集信息。也没有什么特别的，只是当地的一些东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayQBur02_0003AE94_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He is up to something and I want to know what its is. He is normally at the bar between 8pm and midnight, he is more likely to talk in there
ESP.TRADUIT: 他在策划什么事，我想知道是什么。他通常在晚上8点到午夜之间在酒吧，他更有可能在那里聊天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayQBur02_0003AE94_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alternatively go give his place a spin, see what you can find. Don't get caught, don't kill anyone. Can you manage that? You'll be rewarded.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或者去他家转转，看看能找到什么。别被抓，别杀人，能做到吗？你会得到回报的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayQBur02_0003AE94_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: OK I'm in, what am I looking for?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我加入，我要找什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't know, I just want to know what he is looking for. Let me know when you are done, and no killing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道，我只是想知道他在找什么。你完事了告诉我一声，不许杀人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayQBur03_0003B4AE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage ZkbBurgessTaskQuest01 10 Set ZkbKillRisQuest01.Job01BRay to 4 Set ZkbBurgessTaskQuest01.Job02BRay to 2
Come see me when you are done
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayTalk34_0003AE8E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ris is dead, go look at the body if you want to, I'm not dragging it over here
ESP.TRADUIT: 丽斯死了，你想去看看尸体就去吧，我不会拖过来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's ok, I'm not blind to events, here is your reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系，我不是瞎子，这是给你的奖励。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayTalk35_0003AE93_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Setstage ZkbKillRisQuest01 90 Player.AddItem Caps001 100 Set ZkbKillRisQuest01.Job01BRay to 4
That's ok, I'm not blind to events, would you by any chance be interested in some other work? I'll increase the reward
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系，我不是什么都看不懂的人，你会对其他的工作感兴趣吗？我会增加奖励的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayTalk35_0003BAC5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What if I don't have any money?
I'm afraid protocol prevents me from treating you then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕按照规定我不能给你治疗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult06\ZkbDoctorI_ZkbDrInceTalk03_0003AFF8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not gonna cause any problems right?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult06\ZkbDoctorI_ZkbDrInceTalk03_0003AFF8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell no, just checking the ground rules
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然不会，只是检查一下基本规则。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what brings you by today?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，今天是什么风把你吹来了呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult06\ZkbDoctorI_ZkbDrInceTalk04_0003AFFA_1.ogg

NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult06\ZkbDoctorI_ZkbDrInceGoodby_0003AFFC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some protocol, I thought the followers were meant to help people, not squeeze them for money
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些规矩，我以为天启追随者是为了帮助别人，而不是为了压榨他们的钱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh cause that makes us so much better? get out of my sight, I have nothing to say to you anymore
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，因为这让我们变得更好了吗？滚出我的视线，我跟你没什么可说的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult06\ZkbDoctorI_ZkbDrInceTalk05_0003AFFE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set ZkbDoctorInceQuest01.DRIPissedOff to 1 Set ZkbDoctorInceQuest01.DRIGrumpyDate to GameDaysPassed
I've checked on Burgess and hacked his computer, he's an NCR Mercenary
ESP.TRADUIT: 我查过伯吉斯，黑进了他的电脑，他是个NCR雇佣兵。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That figures, we had some NCR pass through recently. What was he collecting information on?
ESP.TRADUIT: 说得通了，最近有些NCR的人经过我们这里，他们在收集什么信息？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayQBur11_0003B4B2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You killed him didn't you? Idiot. Deals off
ESP.TRADUIT: 是你杀了他，对吧？白痴。交易结束。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayQBur11_0003E1BC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was contracted by the NCR to look for a VaultTec Vault around here
ESP.TRADUIT: 他被NCR雇来在这附近找一个避难所。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayQBur12_0003B4B8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And he was interested in places called 'Ground House' and 'Rita's Cafe'? Know them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他对叫做“地上小屋”和“丽塔咖啡”的地方感兴趣？ 知道吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only the later, it's a place north east of here. Talk to a man called Poke if you ever get there, he might know about the former if you're interested
ESP.TRADUIT: 只知道后者，它在这里的东北方向。如果你去了那里，跟一个叫波克的人谈谈，如果你有兴趣的话，他可能知道前者情况。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayQBur13_0003B4B9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, thanks for that, take this compass, its useful. And if you ever want to use my work bench, come on through, but don't do anything stupid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，谢谢你，带上这个指南针，它很有用。如果你想用我的工作台，那就来吧，但别做傻事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayQBur13_0003B4B9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ris? The Raider queen who wears a goat on her head? I've already killed her
ESP.TRADUIT: 丽斯？头上戴着山羊的掠夺者女王？我已经把她杀了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that what the noise was. Well thanks, that helps a lot. May be you would be interested in something else? it would be worth your while
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是那个声音吗？嗯，谢谢，这很有帮助。也许你会对别的事感兴趣？这是值得你花时间的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayTalk33_0003BB39_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me a shout if you need anything else
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你还需要什么就叫我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Bishop [0501B677] (mod) Quest : ([0503CFF3]ZkbMollyBishopQuest01) Molly Bishop Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Molly Bishop [0501B677] (mod) Quest : ([0503CFF3]ZkbMollyBishopQuest01) Molly Bishop Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult07\ZkbMollyBi_ZkbMollyBGoodby_0003CFFA_1.ogg

NPC : Molly Bishop [0501B677] (mod) Quest : ([0503CFF3]ZkbMollyBishopQuest01) Molly Bishop Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Molly Bishop [0501B677] (mod) Quest : ([0503CFF3]ZkbMollyBishopQuest01) Molly Bishop Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult07\ZkbMollyBi_ZkbMollyBGoodby_0003CFFB_1.ogg

NPC : Molly Bishop [0501B677] (mod) Quest : ([0503CFF3]ZkbMollyBishopQuest01) Molly Bishop Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Molly Bishop [0501B677] (mod) Quest : ([0503CFF3]ZkbMollyBishopQuest01) Molly Bishop Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult07\ZkbMollyBi_ZkbMollyBGoodby_0003CFFC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, don't cause me any trouble OK?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Bishop [0501B677] (mod) Quest : ([0503CFF3]ZkbMollyBishopQuest01) Molly Bishop Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Molly Bishop [0501B677] (mod) Quest : ([0503CFF3]ZkbMollyBishopQuest01) Molly Bishop Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult07\ZkbMollyBi_ZkbMollyBGoodby_0003D000_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, what can I get you then?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Bishop [0501B677] (mod) Quest : ([0503CFF3]ZkbMollyBishopQuest01) Molly Bishop Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Molly Bishop [0501B677] (mod) Quest : ([0503CFF3]ZkbMollyBishopQuest01) Molly Bishop Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult07\ZkbMollyBi_ZkbMollyBTrade_0003CFF9_1.ogg

NPC : Molly Bishop [0501B677] (mod) Quest : ([0503CFF3]ZkbMollyBishopQuest01) Molly Bishop Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Molly Bishop [0501B677] (mod) Quest : ([0503CFF3]ZkbMollyBishopQuest01) Molly Bishop Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult07\ZkbMollyBi_ZkbMollyBTrade_0003CFFF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me a shout if you need anything else
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你还需要什么就叫我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rose Bishop [0501B67D] (mod) Quest : ([0503D001]ZkbRoseBishopQuest01) Rose Bishop Dialog EmotionType : Happy NPC : Rose Bishop [0501B67D] (mod) Quest : ([0503D001]ZkbRoseBishopQuest01) Rose Bishop Dialog EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult09\ZkbRoseBis_ZkbRoseBGoodbye_0003D009_1.ogg

NPC : Rose Bishop [0501B67D] (mod) Quest : ([0503D001]ZkbRoseBishopQuest01) Rose Bishop Dialog EmotionType : Happy NPC : Rose Bishop [0501B67D] (mod) Quest : ([0503D001]ZkbRoseBishopQuest01) Rose Bishop Dialog EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult09\ZkbRoseBis_ZkbRoseBGoodbye_0003D00A_1.ogg

NPC : Rose Bishop [0501B67D] (mod) Quest : ([0503D001]ZkbRoseBishopQuest01) Rose Bishop Dialog EmotionType : Disgust NPC : Rose Bishop [0501B67D] (mod) Quest : ([0503D001]ZkbRoseBishopQuest01) Rose Bishop Dialog EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult09\ZkbRoseBis_ZkbRoseBGoodby2_0003D63C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a seriously stroppy kid out front, she needs to learn some manners
ESP.TRADUIT: 前面的那个孩子脾气很坏，她需要学点礼貌。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who the hell do you think you're talking to? Keep talking like that and you're ass is going to be in the gutter
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以为你在跟谁说话？敢再这样说，你的屁股就会被塞进阴沟里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Bishop [0501B677] (mod) Quest : ([0503CFF3]ZkbMollyBishopQuest01) Molly Bishop Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Molly Bishop [0501B677] (mod) Quest : ([0503CFF3]ZkbMollyBishopQuest01) Molly Bishop Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult07\ZkbMollyBi_ZkbMollyBTalk01_0003D006_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, I'll shut up and keep my opinions to myself
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我会闭嘴，把我的想法留在心里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fair enough, is there anything else you need? I'm a busy women
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，你还需要什么吗？我是个忙碌的女人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly Bishop [0501B677] (mod) Quest : ([0503CFF3]ZkbMollyBishopQuest01) Molly Bishop Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Molly Bishop [0501B677] (mod) Quest : ([0503CFF3]ZkbMollyBishopQuest01) Molly Bishop Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult07\ZkbMollyBi_ZkbMollyBTalk02_0003D008_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well you look like you just crawled out from under a rock, but I'm not judging
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你看起来像刚从岩石下爬出来，但我不做评价。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rose Bishop [0501B67D] (mod) Quest : ([0503D001]ZkbRoseBishopQuest01) Rose Bishop Dialog EmotionType : Surprise NPC : Rose Bishop [0501B67D] (mod) Quest : ([0503D001]ZkbRoseBishopQuest01) Rose Bishop Dialog EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult09\ZkbRoseBis_ZkbRoseBTalk01_0003D011_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With what? your razor sharp intellect? I'll take my chances
ESP.TRADUIT: 用什么？你敏锐的智力？我会碰碰运气的。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rose Bishop [0501B67D] (mod) Quest : ([0503D001]ZkbRoseBishopQuest01) Rose Bishop Dialog EmotionType : Happy NPC : Rose Bishop [0501B67D] (mod) Quest : ([0503D001]ZkbRoseBishopQuest01) Rose Bishop Dialog EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult09\ZkbRoseBis_ZkbRoseBTalk02_0003D013_1.ogg

NPC : Rose Bishop [0501B67D] (mod) Quest : ([0503D001]ZkbRoseBishopQuest01) Rose Bishop Dialog EmotionType : Happy NPC : Rose Bishop [0501B67D] (mod) Quest : ([0503D001]ZkbRoseBishopQuest01) Rose Bishop Dialog EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult09\ZkbRoseBis_ZkbRoseBTalk02_0003D013_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fame, riches, peace throughout the Mojave, but if you can't manage that I'll make do with some food
ESP.TRADUIT: 名声、财富、整个莫哈韦地区的和平，但如果你做不到，我就吃点东西吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like a deal to me
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rose Bishop [0501B67D] (mod) Quest : ([0503D001]ZkbRoseBishopQuest01) Rose Bishop Dialog EmotionType : Happy NPC : Rose Bishop [0501B67D] (mod) Quest : ([0503D001]ZkbRoseBishopQuest01) Rose Bishop Dialog EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult09\ZkbRoseBis_ZkbRoseBTalk21_0003D016_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Food, why the fuck else would I be here, sure as shit not for the service
ESP.TRADUIT: 食物，为什么我他妈的会在这里？当然不是为了服务。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like we don't have enough problems
ESP.TRADUIT: 好像我们的问题还不够多似的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rose Bishop [0501B67D] (mod) Quest : ([0503D001]ZkbRoseBishopQuest01) Rose Bishop Dialog EmotionType : Puzzled NPC : Rose Bishop [0501B67D] (mod) Quest : ([0503D001]ZkbRoseBishopQuest01) Rose Bishop Dialog EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult09\ZkbRoseBis_ZkbRoseBTalk22_0003D018_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And maybe I should shoot you in the face.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我应该朝你的脸开一枪。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rose Bishop [0501B67D] (mod) Quest : ([0503D001]ZkbRoseBishopQuest01) Rose Bishop Dialog EmotionType : Anger NPC : Rose Bishop [0501B67D] (mod) Quest : ([0503D001]ZkbRoseBishopQuest01) Rose Bishop Dialog EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult09\ZkbRoseBis_ZkbRoseBTalk03_0003D01B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set ZkbRoseBishopQuest01.RBPissedOff to 1 Set ZkbRoseBishopQuest01.RBGrumpyDate to GameDaysPassed
Missed me sweet pea, how about you and me get up close and personal
ESP.TRADUIT: 想我了，甜心，你和我亲近点怎么样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I seriously doubt that, you've got about as much personality as a baked potato
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很怀疑，你的个性就像一个烤熟的土豆。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE:
NPC : Rose Bishop [0501B67D] (mod) Quest : ([0503D001]ZkbRoseBishopQuest01) Rose Bishop Dialog
NPC : Rose Bishop [0501B67D] (mod) Quest : ([0503D001]ZkbRoseBishopQuest01) Rose Bishop Dialog
Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult09\ZkbRoseBis_ZkbRoseBTalk31_0003D01D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lets cut out the small talk, just give me the menu
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不要再闲聊了，把菜单给我就行了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rose Bishop [0501B67D] (mod) Quest : ([0503D001]ZkbRoseBishopQuest01) Rose Bishop Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Rose Bishop [0501B67D] (mod) Quest : ([0503D001]ZkbRoseBishopQuest01) Rose Bishop Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult09\ZkbRoseBis_ZkbRoseBTalk32_0003D01F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shut up and get me some food before I hit you
ESP.TRADUIT: 闭嘴，给我拿点吃的，不然我揍你。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rose Bishop [0501B67D] (mod) Quest : ([0503D001]ZkbRoseBishopQuest01) Rose Bishop Dialog EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set ZkbRoseBishopQuest01.RBPissedOff to 1 Set ZkbRoseBishopQuest01.RBGrumpyDate to GameDaysPassed
This job, what exactly would you want me to do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这份工作，你到底想让我做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This job requires a little more subtlety, it's a one time offer, take it or leave it
ESP.TRADUIT: 这份工作需要一点微妙的技巧，这是一份一次性的提议，接受或离开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayQBur01_0003D46F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just give me the menu or I'll throw you over the fucking balcony
ESP.TRADUIT: 把菜单给我，否则我就把你从他妈的阳台上扔下去！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just get the fuck out of here
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rose Bishop [0501B67D] (mod) Quest : ([0503D001]ZkbRoseBishopQuest01) Rose Bishop Dialog EmotionType : Anger NPC : Rose Bishop [0501B67D] (mod) Quest : ([0503D001]ZkbRoseBishopQuest01) Rose Bishop Dialog EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult09\ZkbRoseBis_ZkbRoseBTalk23_0003D63E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set ZkbRoseBishopQuest01.RBPissedOff to 1 Set ZkbRoseBishopQuest01.RBGrumpyDate to GameDaysPassed
Ever heard of 'Ground House'? I found a reference to it prospecting, but the file was corrupted
ESP.TRADUIT: 听说过“地上小屋”吗?我找到了它的参考资料，但文件损坏了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Blu Ray said I should come and talk to you about Ground House, you know this place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 蓝光说我应该过来和你谈谈地上小屋，你知道这个地方吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. There's a locked door in a utility tunnel here that is rumored to lead to it. No idea what's in there, if anything, but it could be valuable
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，这里的综合管道里有一扇锁着的门，据说可以通往那里。不知道里面有什么，如果有的话，但可能很有价值。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalkQ_00040D88_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But it belongs to us, give me one reason why should I give you a crack at it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但它是属于我们的，给我一个理由，我为什么要给你一个机会?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalkQ_00040D88_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] That's two reasons, I only asked for one, but you have a point. Tell you what, I'll give you a shot but you have to prove yourself first
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]这是两个理由，我只问了一个，但你说的有道理。这样吧，我可以给你一次机会，但你得先证明自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalkQ_00040D89_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't get in there and I have the access code. Can you afford to let this opportunity walk away?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你进不去，而我有访问密码。你想放过这个机会吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] We've been sitting on this for a long time, and we can sit on it for as long as we like. I don't think you are right for the job
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]我们在这个问题上已经拖延了很长时间了，我们想拖多久就拖多久。我认为你不适合这份工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalkQ_00040D8A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How long have you been sitting on this? Maybe its time to let someone else work on it
ESP.TRADUIT: 你憋这事多久了？也许是时候让别人来处理了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, is there anything I should know before I go in?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，在我进去之前有什么我应该知道的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Probably, but damned if I know what it is. There is a rebreather next to the access terminal, take it if you want as there may be flooding in there
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能吧，但我不知道那是什么。终端机旁边有一个呼吸器，如果你想的话就拿去吧，因为那里可能灌满了水。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalkQ_00040D8D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Access via this Hotel, go up that shaft opposite my room then just follow your nose, you'll find it
ESP.TRADUIT: 从这家酒店进入，沿着我房间对面的竖井走，然后跟着你的鼻子走，你会找到它的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalkQ_00040D8D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ZkbRCGHQuestCollisionMk1REF.Disable ; Disables collision planes to stop player sneaking back into utility tunnel ZkbRCGHQuestCollisionMk2REF.Disable ZkbRCGHQuestCollisionMk1REF.MarkForDelete ZkbRCGHQuestCollisionMk2REF.MarkForDelete SetStage ZkbGHouseQuest01 22 ZkbRCHotelUtlDoor02REF.Unlock ZkbRCHotelUtlDoor02REF.SetOpenState 1 ZkbRCHotelScafDoor01REF.Unlock
OK, I'm in, I'll weed your garden, you cut me in on this 'Ground House' thing
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我加入，我给你的花园除草，你让我参与地上小屋的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.AddNote ZkbBlinderQuestANote1 Player.AddItem ZkbKeyRCCave 1 SetStage ZkbWaterFieldQuest 10 ; ZkbCave08Exit.Unlock ; cave door leading up to water field ; tidy up for unused thief sequence ZkbRCSheriffsDoorExtREF.Unlock ; Sheriffs office ext door ZkbCompWarnAct01REF.Disable ; Gets rid of companion warnings, no longer required ZkbCompWarnAct01REF.MarkForDelete ZkbCompWarnAct02REF.Disable ZkbCompWarnAct02REF.MarkForDelete ZkbRCThiefSwitchREF.Disable ; removes trap switch for go to jail activator ZkbRCThiefSwitchREF.MarkForDelete ZkbRCThiefSwitchAltREF.Enable ; replaces above trap switch with normal door switch ZkbRCThiefActREF.Disable ; Removes go to jail activator in utility tunnel ZkbRCThiefActREF.MarkForDelete ZkbRCGHQuestCollisionMk1REF.Enable ; Enables collision planes to stop player sneaking back into utility tunnel ZkbRCGHQuestCollisionMk2REF.Enable ZkbRCJailActREF.Disable ; Removes jail cell activator as it is no longer required ZkbRCJailActREF.MarkForDelete
Well I'm back, I've been to your Ground House and it was a complete waste of time
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我回来了，我已经去过你的 "地上小屋"，那完全是在浪费时间。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So it was actually there? Wow, I always thought that door went no-where. But you didn't salvage much though?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以它确实在那里？我一直以为那扇门是开不了的。但你没打捞出什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Surprise NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalkQ_000413B6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The place was looted just after the war. There was just Ghouls, bugs, rodents and stinking water
ESP.TRADUIT: 战后不久，这个地方就被洗劫一空。 只有食尸鬼、虫子、啮齿动物和臭水。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So there were zombies down there after all? No treasure though, well it was worth a shot, guess we are all out of luck
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以那下面还是有食尸鬼的？但没有宝藏？好吧，这值得一试，看来我们都不太走运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Surprise NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalkQ_000413B9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] I see your point, that's a nasty list. Tell you what, I've got this 45 Submachine gun of mine, its a tidy little asset
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]我明白你的意思，这是个令人讨厌的名单。跟你说，我有把点45口径的冲锋枪，这可是笔不小的财产。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalkQ_000413BB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: or this hunting rifle which is a copy of Angels, she didn't need a spare, but its top shelf. What's it to be?
ESP.TRADUIT: 或者这把安琪儿的复制品猎枪，她不需要备用的，在顶层架子上，怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalkQ_000413BB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've put up with spore carriers, Ghouls, bugs, rats and Blu Ray on this, how about compensation?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经受够了孢子携带者，食尸鬼，虫子，老鼠和这里的蓝光，怎么补偿我？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] You think this is a game? where after every little quest there is a reward with some bonus points? Life sucks, deal with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]你以为这是游戏？在每个小任务之后都有奖励和一些积分？生活就是这么糟，面对它吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Disgust NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalkQ_000413BC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I did all the work, I took the risks and I want some compensation
ESP.TRADUIT: 我做了所有的工作，承担了风险，我想要一些补偿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: OK, there you go, here is some ammo as well
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，给你，这还有一些弹药。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalkQ_000413D9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.AddItem ZkbWeap45AutoSubmachineGun 1 80 Player.AddItem NVDLC02Ammo45Auto 50 100 ZkbBlinderPokeREF.Removeitem ZkbWeap45AutoSubmachineGun 1 ZkbBlinderPokeREF.Additem WithAmmoLeverActionShotgunNPC 1 SetStage ZkbGHouseQuest01 100
OK, there you go, here is some ammo as well
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，给你，这还有一些弹药。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalkQ_000413DA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.AddItem ZkbWeapHuntingRifle 1 80 Player.AddItem Ammo308 20 100 SetStage ZkbGHouseQuest01 100
How long do I get one of these cages for?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这笼子我能用多长时间？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Since business is a little slow, you can have it until you leave town. Once you're past the north or the south gate, I'll assume you've gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为生意不太好，你可以在出城之前拥有它。一旦你出了北门或南门，我就认为你已经走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalk0_00041F01_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's up top on the road, looks a bit like a gate
ESP.TRADUIT: 它在道路的最上面，看起来有点像...门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalk0_00041F03_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just south of the lake, there's a barrier and couple of old cars stacked a top of one another.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就在湖的南面，有一堆障碍物和几辆旧汽车叠在一起。。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalk0_00041F05_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We don't guard it anymore but it marks the edge of our territory
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不再守卫它，但它是我们领土的边界。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blinder Poke [05028478] (mod) Quest : ([05029F11]ZkbPokeQuest01) Blinder Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBlinderPoke\ZkbPokeQue_ZkbBlinderTalk0_00041F05_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been sent by the Sarge to do a quick clearance patrol of the road
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被中士派来在路上做一次快速清理巡逻。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Dodds [0500A178] (mod) Quest : ([05019F66]ZkbPvtDodds01Quest) Pvt Dodds Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Private Dodds [0500A178] (mod) Quest : ([05019F66]ZkbPvtDodds01Quest) Pvt Dodds Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\MaleAdult05\ZkbPvtDodd_ZkbDoddsTalk70_000544C5_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，谢谢，我已经讲完了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me a shout if you need anything else
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你还需要什么就叫我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Karen Myers [0501E3BE] (mod) Quest : ([050565C4]ZkbKarenMyersQuest01) Karen Myers Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Karen Myers [0501E3BE] (mod) Quest : ([050565C4]ZkbKarenMyersQuest01) Karen Myers Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult02\ZkbKarenMy_ZkbKarenMGoodby_00056C1F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what do you have to trade?
I'm sure I've got something you'll like
ESP.TRADUIT: 我肯定有你会喜欢的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Karen Myers [0501E3BE] (mod) Quest : ([050565C4]ZkbKarenMyersQuest01) Karen Myers Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Karen Myers [0501E3BE] (mod) Quest : ([050565C4]ZkbKarenMyersQuest01) Karen Myers Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult02\ZkbKarenMy_ZkbKarenMTrade_00056C1C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't know why you want to do a thing like that
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道你为什么要做这样的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Karen Myers [0501E3BE] (mod) Quest : ([050565C4]ZkbKarenMyersQuest01) Karen Myers Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Karen Myers [0501E3BE] (mod) Quest : ([050565C4]ZkbKarenMyersQuest01) Karen Myers Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult02\ZkbKarenMy_ZkbKarenMTalk01_00056C25_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you want to know?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Karen Myers [0501E3BE] (mod) Quest : ([050565C4]ZkbKarenMyersQuest01) Karen Myers Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Karen Myers [0501E3BE] (mod) Quest : ([050565C4]ZkbKarenMyersQuest01) Karen Myers Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult02\ZkbKarenMy_ZkbKarenMTalk10_00056C27_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not really, are you part of the farm? how's that going?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不完全是。你是农场的一员吗？情况如何？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I kind of like being a farmer
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Karen Myers [0501E3BE] (mod) Quest : ([050565C4]ZkbKarenMyersQuest01) Karen Myers Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Karen Myers [0501E3BE] (mod) Quest : ([050565C4]ZkbKarenMyersQuest01) Karen Myers Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult02\ZkbKarenMy_ZkbKarenMTalk22_00056C2D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you want with me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想从我这里得到什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Karen Myers [0501E3BE] (mod) Quest : ([050565C4]ZkbKarenMyersQuest01) Karen Myers Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Karen Myers [0501E3BE] (mod) Quest : ([050565C4]ZkbKarenMyersQuest01) Karen Myers Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult02\ZkbKarenMy_ZkbKarenMTalk22_00056C2D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what can you tell me about this place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你能告诉我关于这个地方的情况吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: My business is none of yours

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know any thing about the NCR?
The New California Republic's got the most power in Nevada, money, troops, you name it
ESP.TRADUIT: 新加州共和国在内华达州拥有最大的权力，金钱，军队，应有尽有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Karen Myers [0501E3BE] (mod) Quest : ([050565C4]ZkbKarenMyersQuest01) Karen Myers Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Karen Myers [0501E3BE] (mod) Quest : ([050565C4]ZkbKarenMyersQuest01) Karen Myers Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult02\ZkbKarenMy_ZkbKarenMTalk12_000585AE_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 有没有遇到过凯撒军团？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Slavers, killers and all other kinds of trouble. The Legion are a bunch of savages
ESP.TRADUIT: 奴隶贩子，杀手和各种各样的麻烦。军团是一群野蛮人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Karen Myers [0501E3BE] (mod) Quest : ([050565C4]ZkbKarenMyersQuest01) Karen Myers Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Karen Myers [0501E3BE] (mod) Quest : ([050565C4]ZkbKarenMyersQuest01) Karen Myers Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult02\ZkbKarenMy_ZkbKarenMTalk13_000585AF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for any information on a vault in these parts
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找这一带一个避难所的线索。

ESP.ORIGINAL: you and every other asshole around here
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和这里的每一个混蛋都是如此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Karen Myers [0501E3BE] (mod) Quest : ([050565C4]ZkbKarenMyersQuest01) Karen Myers Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Karen Myers [0501E3BE] (mod) Quest : ([050565C4]ZkbKarenMyersQuest01) Karen Myers Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult02\ZkbKarenMy_ZkbKarenMTalk15_000585B3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: you come to the wrong place traveler

ESP.ORIGINAL: I take it you don't think there is one
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你不认为有这样的情况？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Karen Myers [0501E3BE] (mod) Quest : ([050565C4]ZkbKarenMyersQuest01) Karen Myers Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Karen Myers [0501E3BE] (mod) Quest : ([050565C4]ZkbKarenMyersQuest01) Karen Myers Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult02\ZkbKarenMy_ZkbKarenMTalk31_000585B5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think so? That's odd cause I've been there
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这么认为吗？那就奇怪了，因为我已经去过那里了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We don't talk about that. Next topic
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不谈这个。下一个话题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Karen Myers [0501E3BE] (mod) Quest : ([050565C4]ZkbKarenMyersQuest01) Karen Myers Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Karen Myers [0501E3BE] (mod) Quest : ([050565C4]ZkbKarenMyersQuest01) Karen Myers Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult02\ZkbKarenMy_ZkbKarenMTalk32_000585B7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing, just passing the time off day
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么，只是打发时间而已。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're kind of odd aren't you?
