ESP.ORIGINAL: You know where to find me
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Karen Myers [0501E3BE] (mod) Quest : ([050565C4]ZkbKarenMyersQuest01) Karen Myers Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Karen Myers [0501E3BE] (mod) Quest : ([050565C4]ZkbKarenMyersQuest01) Karen Myers Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult02\ZkbKarenMy_ZkbKarenMGoodby_000585C2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See you when I see you
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Karen Myers [0501E3BE] (mod) Quest : ([050565C4]ZkbKarenMyersQuest01) Karen Myers Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Karen Myers [0501E3BE] (mod) Quest : ([050565C4]ZkbKarenMyersQuest01) Karen Myers Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult02\ZkbKarenMy_ZkbKarenMGoodby_000585C3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know that Ghoul Burgess? I'm kind of curious about him
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认识那个食尸鬼伯吉斯吗？我对他有点好奇。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Karen Myers [0501E3BE] (mod) Quest : ([050565C4]ZkbKarenMyersQuest01) Karen Myers Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Karen Myers [0501E3BE] (mod) Quest : ([050565C4]ZkbKarenMyersQuest01) Karen Myers Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult02\ZkbKarenMy_ZkbKarenMTalk42_000585BC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you mind if I ask why?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你介意我问一下原因吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Karen Myers [0501E3BE] (mod) Quest : ([050565C4]ZkbKarenMyersQuest01) Karen Myers Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Karen Myers [0501E3BE] (mod) Quest : ([050565C4]ZkbKarenMyersQuest01) Karen Myers Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult02\ZkbKarenMy_ZkbKarenMTalk42_000585BC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not a ghoul fan then? I'm just after some background, so do you know him at all?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是食尸鬼迷吧？我只是想了解一些背景，你认识他吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know that, thing just as much as anyone else around here, it mostly keeps to itself which is just fine by me
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道，这件事和这里的其他人一样，基本上都是保密的，这对我来说很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Karen Myers [0501E3BE] (mod) Quest : ([050565C4]ZkbKarenMyersQuest01) Karen Myers Dialog

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you can't tell me anything specific?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你不能告诉我具体情况吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good riddance to it is all I have to say, never liked having it around
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想说的是摆脱它很好，我从来都不喜欢它在身边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Karen Myers [0501E3BE] (mod) Quest : ([050565C4]ZkbKarenMyersQuest01) Karen Myers Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Karen Myers [0501E3BE] (mod) Quest : ([050565C4]ZkbKarenMyersQuest01) Karen Myers Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult02\ZkbKarenMy_ZkbKarenMTalk44_000585C0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could scrap better quality products of the fucking road
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以扔掉这该死的路上质量更好的东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't waste my time with trouble makers
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会把时间浪费在麻烦制造者身上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Karen Myers [0501E3BE] (mod) Quest : ([050565C4]ZkbKarenMyersQuest01) Karen Myers Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Karen Myers [0501E3BE] (mod) Quest : ([050565C4]ZkbKarenMyersQuest01) Karen Myers Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult02\ZkbKarenMy_ZkbKarenMTalk05_0005933C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you go and join the rest of the human trash across the river?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么你不去加入河对岸的其它人类垃圾？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Karen Myers [0501E3BE] (mod) Quest : ([050565C4]ZkbKarenMyersQuest01) Karen Myers Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Karen Myers [0501E3BE] (mod) Quest : ([050565C4]ZkbKarenMyersQuest01) Karen Myers Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult02\ZkbKarenMy_ZkbKarenMTalk05_0005933C_2.ogg

I thought Follower's protocols were a bit more generous than that
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还以为天启追随者的协议会更慷慨一点呢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: My supplies are rather limited and we can only get more by trading, which requires money, money you don't have. Come back when you have some
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的补给相当有限，我们只能通过贸易来获得更多，这需要钱，而你没有。等你有了钱再回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Doctor Louise Ince [0500E618] (mod) Quest : ([050392B7]ZkbDoctorInceQuest01) Dr Ince Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\FemaleAdult06\ZkbDoctorI_ZkbDrInceTalk06_000667FF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoa there, I got money, I'm just getting a handle on things
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有钱，我只是在处理事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So who around here shoots at you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，这里有谁向你开枪呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is a gang up the road and across the bridge. Junkies, losers and occasionally target practice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 路的那头和桥的那头有一伙人。瘾君子，失败者，偶尔打靶练习。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral NPC : Blu Ray [0501DB88] (mod) Quest : ([05038169]ZkbBluRayQuest01) Blu Ray Dialog EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\ZionTrail.esm\ZkbUniqueBluRay\ZkbBluRayQ_ZkbBluRayTalk21_000675E4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I generally don't worry about them too much
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一般不怎么担心他们。

Find and Kill Dixie the Troll
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到并杀死巨魔迪克西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All Rude and Nasty Mutants Killed, Return to Neville
ESP.TRADUIT: 所有粗鲁野蛮的变种人都被杀了，回去找内维尔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;Set to heal the player of physical damage Player.ResetHealth

;Set to heal the player of addictions
RemoveSpell WithdrawalAlcohol RemoveSpell WithdrawalAntNectar RemoveSpell WithdrawalBuffout RemoveSpell WithdrawalHydra RemoveSpell WithdrawalJet RemoveSpell WithdrawalMentats RemoveSpell WithdrawalMorphine RemoveSpell WithdrawalPsycho RemoveSpell WithdrawalQuantumNukacola RemoveSpell WithdrawalRebound RemoveSpell WithdrawalSteady RemoveSpell WithdrawalTobacco RemoveSpell WithdrawalTurbo ShowMessage AddictionRemovalMsg Set Generic.Addicted to 0
Constant exposure to the events of the wasteland has made you very thick skinned. +1 to Endurance
ESP.TRADUIT: 不断地遭受废土上的各类事件让你的脸皮变得很厚，你的耐力+1。

ESP.ORIGINAL: With a Compass you get a better understanding of the terrain +1 Perception
ESP.TRADUIT: 有了指南针，你可以更好地了解地形，+1感知。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Without a Compass you lose a little spatial awareness
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有指南针，你就会失去一些空间意识。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Such bright lights cause's the Vault Dweller to panic and flee!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如此明亮的光使得避难所居民惊慌失措，四处逃窜！

ESP.ORIGINAL: The bright light drives the Vault Dweller over the edge!
ESP.TRADUIT: 明亮的光线把避难所居民逼到了悬崖上！

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are some notes on the black board. Do you want to log them in your Pipboy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 黑板上有一些笔记。你想把它们记录在你的Pip-Boy里吗？
是的，它们可能是相关的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, do I look like a secretary?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我看上去像个秘书吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Blu Ray, If Tim ever returns and finds you have turned his house into a distillery, he's gonna kill you - Karen
Don't worry about it Karen, he wouldn't. He would be too drunk - Blu Ray
ESP.TRADUIT:
蓝光，如果蒂姆回来发现你把他家变成了酿酒厂，他会杀了你的。- 凯伦
别担心，凯伦，他不会的。他会喝得酩酊大醉的。 - 蓝光

ESP.ORIGINAL: These Vault Dwellers get really confused by UV Light!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些避难所居民真的对紫外线感到困惑！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Greg seems to be quiet enough but keep your eye on Elaine. If she gets any worse we are going to have to move her 'Downstairs'.
ESP.TRADUIT: 格雷格似乎很安静，但要注意伊莱恩。如果她的情况再恶化，我们就要把她搬到“楼下”去了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The current is too strong to swim that way
ESP.TRADUIT: 水流太急，不能往那边游。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It appears to be locked out
Best not get too near the waterfall. The current is quite strong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最好别离瀑布太近，水流很急。
这是20个孢子携带者中的第 %.0f 个
这是10个孢子植物中的第 %.0f 个

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are some cables over to the left of that door down there. If you're good you might just be able to jump onto that tiny ledge, hang onto the cablers and open it. If you're good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那扇门的左边有几根电缆。如果你擅长的话，你可以跳到那个小窗台上，抓住缆绳，打开它。如果你擅长。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You have now learnt all there is from this book, your Melee Weapons skill has been permanently increased by 3 points.
And you also realise Mr Punch was really on to something.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你现在已经从这本书中学到了所有的东西，你的近战武器技能永久增加3点。
你也意识到，潘趣先生真的有点东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Terminal Unlocked with Blu Rays Obscure Password
ESP.TRADUIT: 用蓝光的晦涩密码解锁的终端机

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi Chef, I went through the kids stuff looking for a label to check his name and judging from what I found he might be called Spencer or Max but most likely Linda.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，大厨，我查看了孩子们的东西，想找一个标签来检查他的名字，从我发现的名字来看，他可能叫斯宾塞或马克斯，但最有可能是琳达。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Leave this stuff, it's too risky collecting it straight from the stores anyway. We don't need that missile launcher and I've put that bloody great machine gun you stole in with a load of kitchen stuff upstairs. No one will find it, only the robots come in here, mostly.
Charlie has located a better escape stash, one tailor made for our needs. And the irony is beautiful.
ESP.TRADUIT:
把这些东西留下吧，直接从商店拿回来太冒险了。我们不需要那个导弹发射器，我把你偷来的那把该死的大机关枪和一堆厨房用品放在楼上了。没有人会发现它，只有机器人才会来这里，大部分时候。
查理找到了一个更好的藏身处，为我们量身定做的。讽刺是是它很美。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This monument is dedicated to any modder who ever wondered where the hell his life went.
ESP.TRADUIT:
这座纪念碑是献给所有modder的
谁曾想过他的生活到底去了哪里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Terminal Unlocked with Beth's Trail log
Terminal Unlocked with Vault 616 Mainframe Archive Entry 45187
ESP.TRADUIT: 用66避难所大型计算机存档条目45187解锁终端

ESP.ORIGINAL: Terminal Unlocked with Burgess's Ground House Note
ESP.TRADUIT: 用伯吉斯的地上小屋笔记解锁终端

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Dave
If you're looking for your key, I left in to the yard office, in the ashtray above Jill's desk, next to the Hula Girl.
ESP.TRADUIT:
戴夫
如果你在找你的钥匙，我把钥匙留在院子办公室了，在吉尔桌子上面的烟灰缸里，就在草裙舞女郎旁边。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Dave
If you're looking for your key, I left in to the yard office, in the ashtray above Jill's desk, next to the Hula Girl.
ESP.TRADUIT:
戴夫
如果你在找你的钥匙，我把钥匙留在院子办公室了，在吉尔桌子上面的烟灰缸里，就在草裙舞女郎旁边。.

ESP.ORIGINAL:
June,
Can you get Harry in the Machine Shop to cut me a spare key to the Supervisors office. And tell him not to leave it lying around, they keep guns in there remember.
David
ESP.TRADUIT:
琼,
你能让机械车间的哈里给我弄把监管办公室的备用钥匙吗。告诉他别乱放，里面有枪，别忘了。
- 大卫

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe your companion(s) should wait outside
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你的同伴们应该在外面等着

ESP.ORIGINAL: There appears to be no power
You have discovered the outcome of John Doyle's Expedition. Do you wish to continue the quest to learn the fate of all the crew?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经发现了约翰·道尔探险的结果。你想继续探索，了解所有成员的命运吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, screw it, life goes on
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，管它呢，生活还得继续。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have uncovered the fate of John Doyle and his entire crew. C'est la vie. Perk added: Stoicism
ESP.TRADUIT:
你揭露了约翰·道尔和他的全体成员的命运。
这就是生活。
Perk增加:斯多葛主义

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You have now learnt all there is from this book, your Barter skill has been permanently increased by 3 points.
Shyster
ESP.TRADUIT:
你现在已经学会了这本书的所有内容，你的交易技能永久增加3点。
卑鄙小人

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You have now learnt all there is from this book, your Energy Weapons skill has been permanently increased by 3 points.
And you can cook the deer at the same time
ESP.TRADUIT:
你现在已经学会了这本书的所有内容，你的能量武器技能永久增加3点。
而且你还可以同时烹调鹿肉

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You have now learnt all there is from this book, your Explosives skill has been permanently increased by 3 points.
Not as eco friendly as a fishing rod but its a bit late to worry about that now
ESP.TRADUIT:
你现在已经学会了这本书的所有内容，你的爆炸技能永久增加3点。
不像鱼竿那样环保，但现在担心这个有点晚了。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You have now learnt all there is from this book, your Guns skill has been permanently increased by 3 points.
It you are going to shoot something, shoot it properly
ESP.TRADUIT:
你现在已经学会了这本书的所有内容，你的枪械技能永久增加3点。
如果你要射东西，就好好射。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You have now learnt all there is from this book, your Lockpick skill has been permanently increased by 3 points.
And it might improve your hair style as well
ESP.TRADUIT:
你现在已经学会了这本书的所有内容，你的撬锁技能永久增加3点。
而且，它还可能改善你的发型。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You have now learnt all there is from this book, your Medical skill has been permanently increased by 3 points.
Now you know there are better ways to treat cuts and lacerations than with a red hot spoon.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你现在已经从这本书中学到了一切，你的医疗技能永久增加3点。
现在你知道有更好的方法来治疗伤口和撕裂伤，而不是用一个红色的热勺子。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You have now learnt all there is from this book, your Repair skill has been permanently increased by 3 points.
Does anyone else remember Blue Peter? Now there you could learn something
ESP.TRADUIT:
你现在已经学会了这本书的所有内容，你的修理技能永久增加3点。
还有人记得蓝彼得吗？现在你可以在那里学到一些东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This will remove all Zion Trail Story Notes from you inventory permanently, are you sure you want to do this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这将从你的存档里永久删除所有锡安小径故事笔记，你确定你想这样做吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You have now learnt all there is from this book, your Science skill has been permanently increased by 3 points.
You will never look at a light bulb the same way again
ESP.TRADUIT:
你现在已经从这本书中学到了所有的东西，你的科学技能永久增加了3点。
你再也不会以同样的方式看待灯泡了

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You have now learnt all there is from this book, your Sneak skill has been permanently increased by 3 points.
Wait to you see the whites of their eyes, assuming they are not wearing sunglasses
ESP.TRADUIT:
你现在已经从这本书中学到了所有的东西，你的潜行技能永久增加3点。
等着你看到他们的眼白，假设他们没有戴太阳镜

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You have now learnt all there is from this book, your Speech skill has been permanently increased by 3 points.
So you can smell it, but can you dish it out?
ESP.TRADUIT:
你现在已经学会了这本书的所有内容，你的口才技能永久增加3点。
你能闻到它，但你能把它吐出来吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You have now learnt all there is from this book, your Survival skill has been permanently increased by 3 points.
Is there nothing you can't learn in a Vault?
ESP.TRADUIT:
你现在已经从这本书中学到了所有的东西，你的生存技能永久增加了3点。
在避难所里就没有学不到的东西吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You have now learnt all there is from this book, your Unarmed Combat skill has been permanently increased by 3 points.
But just because you can strangle a Grizzly Bear doesn't make it a good idea.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你现在已经学习了这本书的所有内容，你的徒手格斗技能永久增加3点。
但仅仅因为你能勒死一只灰熊并不是个好想法。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your feeling Lucky - maybe someone is watching over you
ESP.TRADUIT: 你感觉很幸运--也许有人在看着你

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't feel so Lucky now
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在感觉不那么幸运了。
这是43页笔记中的第 %.0f 页

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have already killed Dr Fent!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经杀死了芬特博士！

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have already killed Dixie the Troll!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经杀死了巨魔迪克西！

ESP.ORIGINAL: The water pressure in the Cistern is far to high to let you open the door.
ESP.TRADUIT: 蓄水池里的水压高得让你打不开门。
